programme.title: Ex Machina
Ex Machina
programme.desc: Ex Machina: Directed by Alex Garland. With Domhnall Gleeson, Alicia Vikander, Oscar Isaac, Sonoya Mizuno. A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a highly advanced humanoid A.I." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0470752/","name":"Ex Machina","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxNzc0OTIxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI3NzU2NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a highly advanced humanoid A.I.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0470752/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Jim-Eadon"},"dateCreated":"2015-09-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Intelligent Movie","reviewBody":"This movie is obviously allegorical, a fascinating tale about AI, but it is mainly about manipulation and power. It isn't for those wanting action or spectacular CGI, the movie is aimed at people who like to think, rather than passively wait to be entertained. There are themes here not only about AI, but also about surveillance, with excellent points about how data about us is collected by phone companies, search engine companies, commercial operating systems makers and so on. The plot seems simple but isn't, it's extremely clever, with the protagonist playing games, trying to stay one step ahead of one another. This is a movie with perfectly consistent internal logic that plays out perfectly. Don't go in expecting too much, however, as I can see most people will not be satisfied by this movie, but for me, it does what it sets out to do brilliantly. Therefore I give at least 9/10. And most recent movies have been getting 5/10 from me. This movie succeeds where another recent movie about AI, Transcendence, I think it is called, failed (but it was an interesting failure). A third movie about AI, a Spanish movie called Eva, was also brilliant. Eva was more moving and this movie more philosophical. But both movies were perfect in their different ways. The AI's name in this movie, Ava, seems to be a nod to the title of the Spanish movie. As an aside, it's nice that no "stars" appeared in "Ex Machina" and "Eva", the casting was great. Of course there are several aspects of this movie that are unrealistic and often absurd. But because this is an allegorical movie, these are acceptable, because the movie is making points, rather than striving for realism. It's more of a fairytale than accurate portrayal.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":511079,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2015-01-21","keywords":"artificial intelligence,turing test,minimal cast,robot,robot human relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"New Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi744337689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUyMjQzNzk0MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE4NjM0NTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUyMjQzNzk0MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE4NjM0NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young programmer is selected to participate in a breakthrough experiment in artificial intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a breathtaking female A.I.\r\n"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2539953/","name":"Alicia Vikander"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1727304/","name":"Domhnall Gleeson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1209966/","name":"Oscar Isaac"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0307497/","name":"Alex Garland"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0390816/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0197272/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0307497/","name":"Alex Garland"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Bacurau: Directed by Juliano Dornelles, Kleber Mendonça Filho. With Bárbara Colen, Thomas Aquino, Silvero Pereira, Thardelly Lima. After the death of her grandmother, Teresa comes home to her matriarchal village in a near-future Brazil to find a succession of sinister events that mobilizes all of its residents." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2762506/","name":"Bacurau","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjc1N2M1YjMtYzBiNi00NGFiLThkN2QtY2EwZGU5MDRkODAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkzODUwNzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"After the death of her grandmother, Teresa comes home to her matriarchal village in a near-future Brazil to find a succession of sinister events that mobilizes all of its residents.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2762506/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Xstal"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Strange & Curious Proposition...","reviewBody":"One of the strangest films I've seen, in any language, but it must have been good because I'm still processing it a day or two later. The underlying meaning and the intent are not too far off the mark - we're all targeted, hunted and sacrificed by factions that seek to profit from our misfortune, lack of opportunity, demographic, vulnerability and fear; especially when amplified by poverty - if we don't look after ourselves, nobody will. One for all and all for one!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":25198,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Adventure","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2019-08-29","keywords":"village,revenge,funeral,drone,murder","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bacurau","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1699659545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjFlNzA2MTktOWM3Zi00YWE1LTgxOWItOTQwYmMxZDRiZDFhXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjFlNzA2MTktOWM3Zi00YWE1LTgxOWItOTQwYmMxZDRiZDFhXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8152221/","name":"Bárbara Colen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6203018/","name":"Thomas Aquino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6320498/","name":"Silvero Pereira"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2289860/","name":"Juliano Dornelles"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2207625/","name":"Kleber Mendonça Filho"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0167278/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0063732/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0581748/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2207625/","name":"Kleber Mendonça Filho"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2289860/","name":"Juliano Dornelles"}],"duration":"PT2H11M"}</script><metacontent="

Run: Directed by Aneesh Chaganty. With Sarah Paulson, Kiera Allen, Sara Sohn, Pat Healy. A homeschooled teenager begins to suspect her mother is keeping a dark secret from her." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8633478/","name":"Run","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjdmZDlkMzItNTg0OS00MjAxLWE0ZTQtZjdhOWM1MTJkOTc0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homeschooled teenager begins to suspect her mother is keeping a dark secret from her.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8633478/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Neon_Gold"},"dateCreated":"2020-11-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Really Fun and Well Made","reviewBody":"This was such a good thriller. I think it was one of the most effective ones that i have seen this year.

It was defiantly a fun, hour and a half popcorn fun movie but i think it was just that little bit extra too. The filmmaking was above that for me. It just had that little bit of extra care put into it and i think it made all the difference.

The acting was really great from both of the leads. I was really impressed with Kiera Allen. This was her debut film and i think this will net her even more roles because she was fantastic.

I found the score really great too. It really worked together with the script and filmmaking to really get you into the film. I appreciated it.

You should definitely watch this, its really fun, supper quick and well made.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":62933,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-11-20","keywords":"revenge,kidnapping,villainess played by lead actress,mother daughter relationship,child abduction","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1238024473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2EwOWRkMjAtNmRiOS00MTY5LTgxZmMtNDc5OGM4MDVhYmQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2EwOWRkMjAtNmRiOS00MTY5LTgxZmMtNDc5OGM4MDVhYmQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homeschooled teenager begins to suspect her mother is keeping a dark secret from her."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005299/","name":"Sarah Paulson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6266674/","name":"Kiera Allen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3337639/","name":"Sara Sohn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3792134/","name":"Aneesh Chaganty"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0173285/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3792134/","name":"Aneesh Chaganty"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3539578/","name":"Sev Ohanian"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Everest
Everest
programme.desc:
Everest: Directed by Baltasar Kormákur. With Jason Clarke, Ang Phula Sherpa, Thomas M. Wright, Martin Henderson. The story of New Zealand's Robert "Rob" Edwin Hall, who on May 10, 1996, together with Scott Fischer, teamed up on a joint expedition to ascend Mount Everest." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2719848/","name":"Everest","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTNmMzM0ZTktZWY3Yy00ODViLTllZDgtODcwM2QyM2E2YTU2L2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of New Zealand's Robert "Rob" Edwin Hall, who on May 10, 1996, together with Scott Fischer, teamed up on a joint expedition to ascend Mount Everest.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2719848/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Incendid"},"dateCreated":"2015-09-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Flawed.","reviewBody":"Everest is a film that tells the story of the 1996 Mount Everest disaster, in which a climbing expedition is devastated by a severe storm. The film was directed by 2 Guns director Baltasar Kormakur and written by William Nicholson (Gladiator, Les Miserables) and Oscar winner Simon Beaufoy (Slumdog Millionaire and 127 Hours), starring Jason Clarke, John Hawkes and Josh Brolin. To start the film is beautiful; the director of photography Salvatore Totino presented the size and scale of the environment beautifully with multiple aerial shots. Totino has a clear and linear style, which is refreshing after the summer, which with the exception of a couple of films, has been dominated by shaky-cam and extremely quick cuts.

The dialogue in the film stands out, however the plot does not. The characters were underdeveloped, partially due to the lack of introduction that is given to our main characters; this combined with the slow pace of the first act causes the film to drag. However it should be noted that the film makes a point of showing the process of preparing to climb Everest. The second act is fine, not great though and is intense especially during the storm and finally the film just finishes, which really throws you out of the film. 

Although none of the performances in the film were award-worthy they still were acceptable and in some cases quite good. Jason Clarke and Josh Brolin had the meatiest roles, and they both provided good performances. However out of the two, Jason Clarke provided the best performance. The side characters were forgettable, with the exception of Doug (John Hawkes) and Yasuko (Naoko Mori), with Doug being a postman and Yasuko finally completing the seven summits, two things which helped to distinguish them. Everyone in the film was 'care-beared', thankfully, and they had to be otherwise it would impossible to tell who you were looking at.

One part of production that deserves praise in this film is the lighting department who did a superb job on presenting a clear environment; especially during the storm. A quick side note- the score of the film was forgettable. 

Ultimately, Everest is an intense drama thriller that has its problems, however is still beautiful to watch, I wouldn't purchase it on 3D Blu-ray, as after watching it in 3D I didn't find anything spectacular or noteworthy, however I would consider buying it on Blu-ray. Overall, I am going to give Everest a C+ or 6/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":210841,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Biography"],"datePublished":"2015-09-16","keywords":"mount everest,mountain climbing,survival,mountain,man versus nature","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"IMAX Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1946006297","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg1NjUxNDE3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDE1OTY0NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg1NjUxNDE3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDE1OTY0NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Inspired by the incredible events surrounding an attempt to reach the summit of the world's highest mountain, Everest documents the awe-inspiring journey of two different expeditions challenged beyond their limits by one of the fiercest snowstorms ever encountered by mankind. Their mettle tested by the harshest elements found on the planet, the climbers will face nearly impossible obstacles as a lifelong obsession becomes a breathtaking struggle for survival."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0164809/","name":"Jason Clarke"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7583273/","name":"Ang Phula Sherpa"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0942876/","name":"Thomas M. Wright"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0466349/","name":"Baltasar Kormákur"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057311/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0450900/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0073388/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629933/","name":"William Nicholson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0064479/","name":"Simon Beaufoy"}],"duration":"PT2H1M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Cast Away
Brodolom života
programme.desc:
Cast Away: Directed by Robert Zemeckis. With Paul Sanchez, Lari White, Leonid Citer, David Allen Brooks. A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0162222/","name":"Cast Away","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2Y5ZTU4YjctMDRmMC00MTg4LWE1M2MtMjk4MzVmOTE4YjkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTc1NTQxODI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0162222/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"little-bee007"},"dateCreated":"2007-04-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"I was deeply touched","reviewBody":"******This may contain spoilers******

It's a superb,well directed and well acted movie!Well done,Hanks!!!

I'm a Hanks fan!!!I really appreciate his outstanding performance.I consider him a genius in acting.He never just acts.However,he gives life to his characters ,and makes himself exactly what they are.Forrest Gump,Saving Private Ryan,The Terminal,The Da Vinci Code,including this movie are all my favorites.I'm always deeply touched by his movies.And they often make me cry,make me think,and make me understand more about life and love.Cast Away is without exception.

I was moved by Chuck's spirits. His imagination(he names a volleyball Wilson and talks with him as a friend),his perseverance toward love,and his courage to face problems,all these enable him to survive and finally return to his homeland.

When Chuck and Kelly embraced each other in the rain, I burst out crying.They are true lovers.But,fate is cruel.His beloved fiancée,his only belief during those terrible days and nights is forever gone.His hope is disillusioned.He is standing at a life crossroads,thinking and hesitating.He has to choose a way to begin his new life.

I greatly recommend this movie.Don't feel boring,just be patient.I think movies are not only seen by eyes,but also by heart.Use your heart to feel what the characters feel.Then the more you see it,the more you'll be inspired and the more you'll find.Finally,hope you enjoy other Hanks movies!!!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":561398,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2001-02-07","keywords":"survival,crash survivor,remote island,talking to an inanimate object,lost at sea","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi127449625","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWY3MGY2ODktY2NkOC00NTljLTk0YmMtZWUyYmVlMTVkZWY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1hcmNtYW5u._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWY3MGY2ODktY2NkOC00NTljLTk0YmMtZWUyYmVlMTVkZWY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1hcmNtYW5u._V1_.jpg","description":"The official trailer for 'Cast Away' starring Tom Hanks."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000158/","name":"Tom Hanks"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000166/","name":"Helen Hunt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0584052/","name":"Paul Sanchez"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000709/","name":"Robert Zemeckis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038131/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0115310/","name":"William Broyles Jr."}],"duration":"PT2H23M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0162222, Title: Cast Away, --- Description: Cast Away: Directed by Robert Zemeckis. With Paul Sanchez, Lari White, Leonid Citer, David Allen Brooks. A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0162222/","name":"Cast Away","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2Y5ZTU4YjctMDRmMC00MTg4LWE1M2MtMjk4MzVmOTE4YjkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTc1NTQxODI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0162222/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"little-bee007","dateCreated":"2007-04-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"I was deeply touched","reviewBody":"******This may contain spoilers******

It's a superb,well directed and well acted movie!Well done,Hanks!!!

I'm a Hanks fan!!!I really appreciate his outstanding performance.I consider him a genius in acting.He never just acts.However,he gives life to his characters ,and makes himself exactly what they are.Forrest Gump,Saving Private Ryan,The Terminal,The Da Vinci Code,including this movie are all my favorites.I'm always deeply touched by his movies.And they often make me cry,make me think,and make me understand more about life and love.Cast Away is without exception.

I was moved by Chuck's spirits. His imagination(he names a volleyball Wilson and talks with him as a friend),his perseverance toward love,and his courage to face problems,all these enable him to survive and finally return to his homeland.

When Chuck and Kelly embraced each other in the rain, I burst out crying.They are true lovers.But,fate is cruel.His beloved fiancée,his only belief during those terrible days and nights is forever gone.His hope is disillusioned.He is standing at a life crossroads,thinking and hesitating.He has to choose a way to begin his new life.

I greatly recommend this movie.Don't feel boring,just be patient.I think movies are not only seen by eyes,but also by heart.Use your heart to feel what the characters feel.Then the more you see it,the more you'll be inspired and the more you'll find.Finally,hope you enjoy other Hanks movies!!!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":561398,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2001-02-07","keywords":"survival,crash survivor,remote island,talking to an inanimate object,lost at sea","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi127449625","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWY3MGY2ODktY2NkOC00NTljLTk0YmMtZWUyYmVlMTVkZWY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1hcmNtYW5u._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWY3MGY2ODktY2NkOC00NTljLTk0YmMtZWUyYmVlMTVkZWY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1hcmNtYW5u._V1_.jpg","description":"The official trailer for 'Cast Away' starring Tom Hanks.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000158/","name":"Tom Hanks","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000166/","name":"Helen Hunt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0584052/","name":"Paul Sanchez"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000709/","name":"Robert Zemeckis"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038131/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0115310/","name":"William Broyles Jr."],"duration":"PT2H23M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Everest
Everest
programme.desc:
Everest: Directed by Baltasar Kormákur. With Jason Clarke, Ang Phula Sherpa, Thomas M. Wright, Martin Henderson. The story of New Zealand's Robert "Rob" Edwin Hall, who on May 10, 1996, together with Scott Fischer, teamed up on a joint expedition to ascend Mount Everest." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2719848/","name":"Everest","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTNmMzM0ZTktZWY3Yy00ODViLTllZDgtODcwM2QyM2E2YTU2L2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of New Zealand's Robert "Rob" Edwin Hall, who on May 10, 1996, together with Scott Fischer, teamed up on a joint expedition to ascend Mount Everest.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2719848/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Incendid"},"dateCreated":"2015-09-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Flawed.","reviewBody":"Everest is a film that tells the story of the 1996 Mount Everest disaster, in which a climbing expedition is devastated by a severe storm. The film was directed by 2 Guns director Baltasar Kormakur and written by William Nicholson (Gladiator, Les Miserables) and Oscar winner Simon Beaufoy (Slumdog Millionaire and 127 Hours), starring Jason Clarke, John Hawkes and Josh Brolin. To start the film is beautiful; the director of photography Salvatore Totino presented the size and scale of the environment beautifully with multiple aerial shots. Totino has a clear and linear style, which is refreshing after the summer, which with the exception of a couple of films, has been dominated by shaky-cam and extremely quick cuts.

The dialogue in the film stands out, however the plot does not. The characters were underdeveloped, partially due to the lack of introduction that is given to our main characters; this combined with the slow pace of the first act causes the film to drag. However it should be noted that the film makes a point of showing the process of preparing to climb Everest. The second act is fine, not great though and is intense especially during the storm and finally the film just finishes, which really throws you out of the film. 

Although none of the performances in the film were award-worthy they still were acceptable and in some cases quite good. Jason Clarke and Josh Brolin had the meatiest roles, and they both provided good performances. However out of the two, Jason Clarke provided the best performance. The side characters were forgettable, with the exception of Doug (John Hawkes) and Yasuko (Naoko Mori), with Doug being a postman and Yasuko finally completing the seven summits, two things which helped to distinguish them. Everyone in the film was 'care-beared', thankfully, and they had to be otherwise it would impossible to tell who you were looking at.

One part of production that deserves praise in this film is the lighting department who did a superb job on presenting a clear environment; especially during the storm. A quick side note- the score of the film was forgettable. 

Ultimately, Everest is an intense drama thriller that has its problems, however is still beautiful to watch, I wouldn't purchase it on 3D Blu-ray, as after watching it in 3D I didn't find anything spectacular or noteworthy, however I would consider buying it on Blu-ray. Overall, I am going to give Everest a C+ or 6/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":210841,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Biography"],"datePublished":"2015-09-16","keywords":"mount everest,mountain climbing,survival,mountain,man versus nature","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"IMAX Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1946006297","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg1NjUxNDE3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDE1OTY0NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg1NjUxNDE3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDE1OTY0NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Inspired by the incredible events surrounding an attempt to reach the summit of the world's highest mountain, Everest documents the awe-inspiring journey of two different expeditions challenged beyond their limits by one of the fiercest snowstorms ever encountered by mankind. Their mettle tested by the harshest elements found on the planet, the climbers will face nearly impossible obstacles as a lifelong obsession becomes a breathtaking struggle for survival."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0164809/","name":"Jason Clarke"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7583273/","name":"Ang Phula Sherpa"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0942876/","name":"Thomas M. Wright"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0466349/","name":"Baltasar Kormákur"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057311/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0450900/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0073388/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629933/","name":"William Nicholson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0064479/","name":"Simon Beaufoy"}],"duration":"PT2H1M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Jack Reacher
Jack Reacher
programme.desc: Jack Reacher: Directed by Christopher McQuarrie. With Tom Cruise, Rosamund Pike, Richard Jenkins, David Oyelowo. A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0790724/","name":"Jack Reacher","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM1NjUxMDI3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjg1ODM3OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0790724/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Bruce722"},"dateCreated":"2013-05-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great film.","reviewBody":"Jack Reacher was a surprisingly fantastic film. I went in thinking, thanks to some slightly misleading trailers, that this was going to be a high octane action movie with a bunch of gun fights, car chases, and explosions but little development and quality. I was completely wrong. While there were a few gun fights, one car chase, and an explosion of sorts, it was done in a completely different manner and was more of an action thriller. Tom Cruise did a great job in his typical role. The rest of the supporting cast was solid enough and the cameo by Robert Duvall was awesome. The plot developed really well and made it more of a "thinking movie" than I anticipated. That being said, the turns in the plot kept the film from becoming stagnant or boring and the action sequences felt real and authentic. I wasn't a huge fan of some of the cinematic elements and there were some flaws in one of the plot twists but nothing that really hurt the movie-watching experience. All-in-all, I'd say this was a great movie that most people would very much enjoy watching.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":325851,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2012-12-26","keywords":"sniper,coma,quarry,pittsburgh pennsylvania,heads knocked together","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. Version #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1158194201","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI2NzA4NjU0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDM4MzI2OA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI2NzA4NjU0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDM4MzI2OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims.\r\n"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000129/","name":"Tom Cruise"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0683253/","name":"Rosamund Pike"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0420955/","name":"Richard Jenkins"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003160/","name":"Christopher McQuarrie"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0152219/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0769768/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1676193/","name":"Lee Child"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003160/","name":"Christopher McQuarrie"}],"duration":"PT2H10M"}</script><metacontent="

A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0790724/","name":"Jack Reacher","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM1NjUxMDI3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjg1ODM3OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0790724/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Bruce722","dateCreated":"2013-05-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great film.","reviewBody":"Jack Reacher was a surprisingly fantastic film. I went in thinking, thanks to some slightly misleading trailers, that this was going to be a high octane action movie with a bunch of gun fights, car chases, and explosions but little development and quality. I was completely wrong. While there were a few gun fights, one car chase, and an explosion of sorts, it was done in a completely different manner and was more of an action thriller. Tom Cruise did a great job in his typical role. The rest of the supporting cast was solid enough and the cameo by Robert Duvall was awesome. The plot developed really well and made it more of a "thinking movie" than I anticipated. That being said, the turns in the plot kept the film from becoming stagnant or boring and the action sequences felt real and authentic. I wasn't a huge fan of some of the cinematic elements and there were some flaws in one of the plot twists but nothing that really hurt the movie-watching experience. All-in-all, I'd say this was a great movie that most people would very much enjoy watching.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":325851,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2012-12-26","keywords":"sniper,coma,quarry,pittsburgh pennsylvania,heads knocked together","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. Version #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1158194201","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI2NzA4NjU0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDM4MzI2OA@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI2NzA4NjU0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDM4MzI2OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims.\r\n","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000129/","name":"Tom Cruise","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0683253/","name":"Rosamund Pike","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0420955/","name":"Richard Jenkins"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003160/","name":"Christopher McQuarrie"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0152219/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0769768/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1676193/","name":"Lee Child","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003160/","name":"Christopher McQuarrie"],"duration":"PT2H10M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Madame Bovary
Gospođa Bovary
programme.desc:
Madame Bovary: Directed by Claude Chabrol. With Isabelle Huppert, Jean-François Balmer, Christophe Malavoy, Jean Yanne. In nineteenth-century France, the romantic daughter of a country squire marries a dull country doctor. To escape boredom, she throws herself into love affairs with a suave local landowner and a law student, and runs up ruinous debts." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0102368/","name":"Madame Bovary","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDY3YjIyMDItMWNlMS00ZDIzLWJhMDUtN2NlOTNjMmI3MGUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzUyOTc@._V1_.jpg","description":"In nineteenth-century France, the romantic daughter of a country squire marries a dull country doctor. To escape boredom, she throws herself into love affairs with a suave local landowner and a law student, and runs up ruinous debts.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0102368/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dbdumonteil"},"dateCreated":"2007-04-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"the film Flaubert would have made from his novel","reviewBody":"This was Claude Chabrol's intention and it's easier to say than to do. Gustave Flaubert's novel was so rich, undulating that any adaptation in images can only be reducing and simplistic. More than the tragic story of its heroine, Flaubert's novel encompassed a word picture of Normandy (the bulk of the film was shot in the village of Lyons-La-Forêt near Rouen) and a cruel, cynical vision of the world. If the first feature is satisfying on the screen, the second one is hardly perceptible. Hence, this crucial question: is it possible to fully recreate Flaubert's novel? Chabrol's film is faithful to the main plot with the rise and fall of her heroine sometimes told by François Périer's voice-over in spite of accelerated views on certain vital episodes, notably the peasant marriage that disgusted Emma Bovary. On the other hand, the crest of the novel (the ball to the marquis) found a perfect equivalent in Chabrol's film with this shot which goes through the turning dresses creating thus a whirlpool. The glittering life Emma dreams of instead of a dull one with her mediocre husband Charles.

Chabrol is buoyed by topnotch interpretations. Even if Isabelle Huppert is a convincing Emma Bovary, a woman whose messy dreams and follies badly conceal boredom and disgust of her condition, the other main actors steal the show with Jean-François Balmer as the perfect, narrow-minded Charles Bovary, Christophe Malavoy as unfaithful Rodolphe Boulanger and Jean Yanne as the unscrupulous chemist Homais.

"Madame Bovary" is aesthetically a refined work with lush scenery and lavish costumes that recreate rural life in Normandy in the middle of the nineteenth Century. But Chabrol doesn't break new ground with this adaptation that required something else than an elegant directing, a brilliant cast and splendid scenery. That's why his rendering of Flaubert's work is just an honorable reading of the novel in the end. One could also add that Flaubert's book was a solid opportunity for an onslaught at provincial lower middle class. But it's only skimmed over and it's a wasted bonanza.

Chabrol's reading of "Madame Bovary" amounts to the same result as Claude Berri's adaptation of Emile Zola's epic novel "Germinal" in 1993: honorable instead of being unforgettable, a commendable action instead of a ground-breaking creation. The author of "le Boucher" (1970) was rather on the wrong track but fortunately, he'll find his way again the following year with another woman depiction: "Betty" (1992). Georges Simenon's universe suits him much better than Flaubert's one.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3885,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1991-04-03","keywords":"character name as title,emma bovary character,period drama,quoting alphonse de lamartine,wedding","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Madame Bovary (1991)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3198616345","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmY4NDQ3ZjItNDY2OC00NWM5LTg4ZDMtZDczNmIxNWJlZTRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmY4NDQ3ZjItNDY2OC00NWM5LTg4ZDMtZDczNmIxNWJlZTRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Samuel Goldwyn"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001376/","name":"Isabelle Huppert"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050983/","name":"Jean-François Balmer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0539022/","name":"Christophe Malavoy"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001031/","name":"Claude Chabrol"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022545/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0055736/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0254873/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0281306/","name":"Gustave Flaubert"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001031/","name":"Claude Chabrol"}],"duration":"PT2H23M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Run
Šiva
programme.desc:
Run: Directed by Aneesh Chaganty. With Sarah Paulson, Kiera Allen, Sara Sohn, Pat Healy. A homeschooled teenager begins to suspect her mother is keeping a dark secret from her." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8633478/","name":"Run","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjdmZDlkMzItNTg0OS00MjAxLWE0ZTQtZjdhOWM1MTJkOTc0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homeschooled teenager begins to suspect her mother is keeping a dark secret from her.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8633478/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Neon_Gold"},"dateCreated":"2020-11-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Really Fun and Well Made","reviewBody":"This was such a good thriller. I think it was one of the most effective ones that i have seen this year.

It was defiantly a fun, hour and a half popcorn fun movie but i think it was just that little bit extra too. The filmmaking was above that for me. It just had that little bit of extra care put into it and i think it made all the difference.

The acting was really great from both of the leads. I was really impressed with Kiera Allen. This was her debut film and i think this will net her even more roles because she was fantastic.

I found the score really great too. It really worked together with the script and filmmaking to really get you into the film. I appreciated it.

I think it was one of the most effective ones that i have seen this year.

It was defiantly a fun, hour and a half popcorn fun movie but i think it was just that little bit extra too. The filmmaking was above that for me. It just had that little bit of extra care put into it and i think it made all the difference.

The acting was really great from both of the leads. I was really impressed with Kiera Allen. This was her debut film and i think this will net her even more roles because she was fantastic.

I found the score really great too. It really worked together with the script and filmmaking to really get you into the film. I appreciated it.

You should definitely watch this, its really fun, supper quick and well made.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":62933,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-11-20","keywords":"revenge,kidnapping,villainess played by lead actress,mother daughter relationship,child abduction","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1238024473","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2EwOWRkMjAtNmRiOS00MTY5LTgxZmMtNDc5OGM4MDVhYmQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2EwOWRkMjAtNmRiOS00MTY5LTgxZmMtNDc5OGM4MDVhYmQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homeschooled teenager begins to suspect her mother is keeping a dark secret from her.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005299/","name":"Sarah Paulson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6266674/","name":"Kiera Allen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3337639/","name":"Sara Sohn"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3792134/","name":"Aneesh Chaganty"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0173285/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3792134/","name":"Aneesh Chaganty","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3539578/","name":"Sev Ohanian"],"duration":"PT1H30M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Werk ohne Autor
Djelo bez autora
programme.desc:
Werk ohne Autor: Directed by Florian Henckel von Donnersmarck. With Tom Schilling, Sebastian Koch, Paula Beer, Saskia Rosendahl. German artist Kurt Barnert has escaped East Germany and now lives in West Germany, but is tormented by his childhood under the Nazis and the GDR-regime." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5311542/","name":"Werk ohne Autor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGE2ZmVhOGUtOWE4Ni00MDZiLWJkMTktOWI5ZWU0ZDk1NGViXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzI1NzMxNzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"German artist Kurt Barnert has escaped East Germany and now lives in West Germany, but is tormented by his childhood under the Nazis and the GDR-regime.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5311542/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"chong_an"},"dateCreated":"2018-09-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"What is truth in art?","reviewBody":"Inspired by the life of one artist and stories by others, this tale of fiction asks artists what is their truth, and how they are able to reveal it. Along the way, it shows how Nazi and Soviet art have strong similarities in their realisms, while modern art can be conceptual jokes.

The humans are 2 families who, if they knew, were on opposite sides during the Nazi era. The artist / husband's father suffered both ways as joining the Nazis too late, while his beloved aunt was sent away by his father-in-law, eventually to the gas chambers. But the father-in-law spends his post-war life in fear of Nazi hunters, even as he hides in plain sight.

Featuring a strong cast and realistic sets, this is a strong movie. Still, from the director's Q+A from the Toronto International Film Festival, the idea of subjective truth that also infuses the film can be a distraction.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19597,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2018-10-03","keywords":"east germany,painter,doctor,forced abortion,pregnancy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1224587801","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMThhNzU3YTktOTgwZS00OTY0LTgwNDctYmI1YWIyYTA1YjA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMThhNzU3YTktOTgwZS00OTY0LTgwNDctYmI1YWIyYTA1YjA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"'Never Look Away' follows thirty years in the life of artist Kurt Barnert (a character loosely based on Gerhard Richter). From a childhood witnessing Nazi Germany to life in post-war East Berlin."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771713/","name":"Tom Schilling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0462407/","name":"Sebastian Koch"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3559009/","name":"Paula Beer"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003697/","name":"Florian Henckel von Donnersmarck"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0569143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008261/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0128215/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003697/","name":"Florian Henckel von Donnersmarck"}],"duration":"PT3H9M"}</script><metacontent="

Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kidcurry1967"},"dateCreated":"2000-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Outstanding!!!","reviewBody":"C.S.I. is the best new show of the 2000 season! William L. Petersen is the coolest of the cool as Gil Grissom. I've followed his career since I first saw him in To Live and Die in L.A. He's an amazing actor and he heads up a cast of amazing actors as well. This show really keeps you on the edge of your seat as the investigators literally take a crime scene that appears to leave them with nothing to go on. The investigators take nothing and turn it into something amazing as each crime is solved right in front of you and you as the viewer, never see it coming! Wow! I hope this is one show CBS will pick up year after year!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":81529,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Bull je angažiran da pomogne ženi koja je odlučna ići protivno pravnom savjetu te inzistira na priznavanju krivice za ubojstvo bogatog filantropa koji ju je zlostavljao dok je bila tinejdžer. Bull je angažiran da pomogne ženi koja je odlučna ići protivno pravnom savjetu te inzistira na priznavanju krivice za ubojstvo bogatog filantropa koji ju je zlostavljao dok je bila tinejdžer.

programme.title: Američki gradovi zločina
programme.desc: Na zabačenoj lokalnoj cesti pronađu povučenu, mladu učiteljicu nasmrt izbodenu. Istražitelje pritišću da pronađu bilo koga s motivom da joj naudi. Ali u gradiću Burleyu, Idaho, kreću šaputanja…. Na zabačenoj lokalnoj cesti pronađu povučenu, mladu učiteljicu nasmrt izbodenu. Istražitelje pritišću da pronađu bilo koga s motivom da joj naudi. Ali u gradiću Burleyu, Idaho, kreću šaputanja….

credits.actor: Mark Benton, Jo Joyner, Patrick Walshe McBride, Amber Aga, Tomos Eames, Morgana Robinson, Julie Atherton, Ramon Tikaram

programme.title: Dr. Blake
programme.desc: Ova serija vodi nas u australsku provinciju pedesetih godina prošlog stoljeća, gdje se doktor-forenzičar Lucien Blake protivi strogim društvenim pravilima. Ova serija vodi nas u australsku provinciju pedesetih godina prošlog stoljeća, gdje se doktor-forenzičar Lucien Blake protivi strogim društvenim pravilima. Dok rješava zločine, dr. Blake sluša tajne i laži svojih pacijenata i pomaže im da unesu mir i pravdu u svoje živote. Blake je obrazovan, proputovao je svijet i vidio najgore što ljudi mogu učiniti jedni drugima. Nakon studija u Škotskoj, dr. Blake je kao vojni ljekar u britanskoj vojsci služio na Dalekom istoku tokom Drugoga svjetskog rata. Bez znanja porodice oženio se Kineskinjom s kojom je dobio dijete. U doba pada Singapura izgubili su kontakt. Na kraju duge i neuspješne potrage za suprugom i djetetom, dr. Blake se vraća u rodni Ballarat, kako bi preuzeo praksu od svog oca na samrti. Progone ga uspomene na ratne užase, zatočeništvo u zloglasnom logoru u Tajlandu i njegov lični gubitak. U javnosti dr. Blake je moralni kompas zajednice, dok je privatno čovjek koji iz prve ruke zna kako ljudi mogu biti nečovječni prema drugima. Rijetki razumiju njegov vragolasti humor i mogu probiti njegov psihološki oklop. Čak ni njegova odana asistentica Jean ponekad nema strpljenja za Dr. Blakea.

This show really keeps you on the edge of your seat as the investigators literally take a crime scene that appears to leave them with nothing to go on. programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: Šesta sezona kreće od vrućeg ljeta 1959. g., kada je sezona vjenčanja bila u punom jeku. Dok vikar spaja sretne parove, detektiv Geordie Keating je zauzet istragom više slučaja ubojstava. U petoj sezoni u Grantchesteru se pojavljuje novi vikar - Will Davenport čovjek blizak ljudima i pun ideala te ga ubrzo privuče detektiv inspektor Geordie Keating i njegov svijet ubojitih zapleta, zločina iz strasti i neočekivanih tragedija.

programme.title: Sweat
Suton
programme.desc:
Sweat: Directed by Magnus von Horn. With Magdalena Kolesnik, Julian Swiezewski, Aleksandra Konieczna, Zbigniew Zamachowski. Three days in the life of fitness motivator Sylwia Zajac, a social media celebrity surrounded by loyal employees and admirers, who is really looking for true intimacy." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt12443946/","name":"Sweat","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGVkMzhiZDYtMzQxMy00NmJhLThhNDEtODJmNjE0ZDUxY2RhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjgxODk1MTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three days in the life of fitness motivator Sylwia Zajac, a social media celebrity surrounded by loyal employees and admirers, who is really looking for true intimacy.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt12443946/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"derek-duerden"},"dateCreated":"2021-09-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Quite Thought-Provoking","reviewBody":"Raising but not wholly dealing with a range of issues, this could be a good film to discuss with a group of friends that have all seen it.

Over and above the brutal "fitness" regime, being an always-on Instagram influencer looks like *very* hard work, and this film (and the lead actor) illustrates that excellently, in my view. Where I'm less sure about it is in the handling of the various side-issues... for example her relationship with her mother and the mall conversation with the schoolfriend - the latter was quite affecting but then they seemed to just "move on". Also, I'm sure that someone that glamorous and high-profile would attract more than one stalker... and I'm unsure about the handling of her culpability in what happens to him.

Nevertheless, it was more interesting than I expected and had a nice circular arc between the opening and closing scenes. Worth a look.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2309,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"Unrated","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-03-12","keywords":"fitness class,instagram,stalker,mother daughter relationship,morning show","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"SWEAT international trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3678780953","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU1ZWEyMjQtOTBmNy00YjUyLWI2MTYtYjllODk3ZmNjMDcwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU1ZWEyMjQtOTBmNy00YjUyLWI2MTYtYjllODk3ZmNjMDcwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5972800/","name":"Magdalena Kolesnik"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6873940/","name":"Julian Swiezewski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1452458/","name":"Aleksandra Konieczna"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3281319/","name":"Magnus von Horn"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0349562/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0338571/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0001935/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3281319/","name":"Magnus von Horn"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dr. Blake
programme.desc: Ova serija vodi nas u australsku provinciju pedesetih godina prošlog stoljeća, gdje se doktor-forenzičar Lucien Blake protivi strogim društvenim pravilima. Ova serija vodi nas u australsku provinciju pedesetih godina prošlog stoljeća, gdje se doktor-forenzičar Lucien Blake protivi strogim društvenim pravilima. Dok rješava zločine, dr. Blake sluša tajne i laži svojih pacijenata i pomaže im da unesu mir i pravdu u svoje živote. Blake je obrazovan, proputovao je svijet i vidio najgore što ljudi mogu učiniti jedni drugima. Nakon studija u Škotskoj, dr. Blake je kao vojni ljekar u britanskoj vojsci služio na Dalekom istoku tokom Drugoga svjetskog rata. Bez znanja porodice oženio se Kineskinjom s kojom je dobio dijete. U doba pada Singapura izgubili su kontakt. Na kraju duge i neuspješne potrage za suprugom i djetetom, dr. Blake se vraća u rodni Ballarat, kako bi preuzeo praksu od svog oca na samrti. Progone ga uspomene na ratne užase, zatočeništvo u zloglasnom logoru u Tajlandu i njegov lični gubitak. U javnosti dr. Blake je moralni kompas zajednice, dok je privatno čovjek koji iz prve ruke zna kako ljudi mogu biti nečovječni prema drugima. Rijetki razumiju njegov vragolasti humor i mogu probiti njegov psihološki oklop. Čak ni njegova odana asistentica Jean ponekad nema strpljenja za Dr. Blakea.

credits.actor: Fabien Baïardi, Mama Bouras, Arthur Choisnet, Marc Duret, Stephanie Dussine, Murielle Hilaire, Malick Laugier, Virginie Ledoyen
Romane Bohringer, Clément Brun, Samuel Le Bihan, Guillaume de Tonquédec, Marianne Denicourt, Patrick Mille, Matilda Anna Ingrid Lutz, Manon Azem

programme.title: Dr. Blake
programme.desc: Ova serija vodi nas u australsku provinciju pedesetih godina prošlog stoljeća, gdje se doktor-forenzičar Lucien Blake protivi strogim društvenim pravilima. Ova serija vodi nas u australsku provinciju pedesetih godina prošlog stoljeća, gdje se doktor-forenzičar Lucien Blake protivi strogim društvenim pravilima. Dok rješava zločine, dr. Blake sluša tajne i laži svojih pacijenata i pomaže im da unesu mir i pravdu u svoje živote. Blake je obrazovan, proputovao je svijet i vidio najgore što ljudi mogu učiniti jedni drugima. Nakon studija u Škotskoj, dr. Blake je kao vojni ljekar u britanskoj vojsci služio na Dalekom istoku tokom Drugoga svjetskog rata. Bez znanja porodice oženio se Kineskinjom s kojom je dobio dijete. U doba pada Singapura izgubili su kontakt. Na kraju duge i neuspješne potrage za suprugom i djetetom, dr. Blake se vraća u rodni Ballarat, kako bi preuzeo praksu od svog oca na samrti. Progone ga uspomene na ratne užase, zatočeništvo u zloglasnom logoru u Tajlandu i njegov lični gubitak. U javnosti dr. Blake je moralni kompas zajednice, dok je privatno čovjek koji iz prve ruke zna kako ljudi mogu biti nečovječni prema drugima. Rijetki razumiju njegov vragolasti humor i mogu probiti njegov psihološki oklop. Čak ni njegova odana asistentica Jean ponekad nema strpljenja za Dr. Blakea.

programme.title: Alice Nevers
programme.desc: Mlada i lijepa Alice Nevers istražna je sutkinja. Udružuje snage s partnerom, policajcem Fredom Marchandom, u razrješavanju zločina - svatko na svoj način. Mlada i lijepa Alice Nevers istražna je sutkinja. Udružuje snage s partnerom, policajcem Fredom Marchandom, u razrješavanju zločina - svatko na svoj način.

programme.title: Američki gradovi zločina
programme.desc: U gradiću Portsmouth, Ohio, nestala je baka od 72 godine. Policija ima samo zagonetne i zloslutne ključeve o tome što se moglo dogoditi. Prijatelji i obitelj nestale nemaju pojma kamo je mogla otići.... U gradiću Portsmouth, Ohio, nestala je baka od 72 godine. Policija ima samo zagonetne i zloslutne ključeve o tome što se moglo dogoditi. Prijatelji i obitelj nestale nemaju pojma kamo je mogla otići. Nitko od susjeda nije zapazio ništa neobično.

credits.actor: Mark Benton, Jo Joyner, Patrick Walshe McBride, Amber Aga, Roberta Taylor, Mac McDonald, Díana Bermudez, Karl Davies

programme.title: Dr. Blake
programme.desc: Ova serija vodi nas u australsku provinciju pedesetih godina prošlog stoljeća, gdje se doktor-forenzičar Lucien Blake protivi strogim društvenim pravilima. Ova serija vodi nas u australsku provinciju pedesetih godina prošlog stoljeća, gdje se doktor-forenzičar Lucien Blake protivi strogim društvenim pravilima. Dok rješava zločine, dr. Blake sluša tajne i laži svojih pacijenata i pomaže im da unesu mir i pravdu u svoje živote. Blake je obrazovan, proputovao je svijet i vidio najgore što ljudi mogu učiniti jedni drugima. Nakon studija u Škotskoj, dr. Blake je kao vojni ljekar u britanskoj vojsci služio na Dalekom istoku tokom Drugoga svjetskog rata. Bez znanja porodice oženio se Kineskinjom s kojom je dobio dijete. U doba pada Singapura izgubili su kontakt. Na kraju duge i neuspješne potrage za suprugom i djetetom, dr. Blake se vraća u rodni Ballarat, kako bi preuzeo praksu od svog oca na samrti. Progone ga uspomene na ratne užase, zatočeništvo u zloglasnom logoru u Tajlandu i njegov lični gubitak. U javnosti dr. Blake je moralni kompas zajednice, dok je privatno čovjek koji iz prve ruke zna kako ljudi mogu biti nečovječni prema drugima. Rijetki razumiju njegov vragolasti humor i mogu probiti njegov psihološki oklop. Čak ni njegova odana asistentica Jean ponekad nema strpljenja za Dr. Blakea.

programme.title: Alice Nevers
programme.desc: Mlada i lijepa Alice Nevers istražna je sutkinja. Udružuje snage s partnerom, policajcem Fredom Marchandom, u razrješavanju zločina - svatko na svoj način. Mlada i lijepa Alice Nevers istražna je sutkinja. Udružuje snage s partnerom, policajcem Fredom Marchandom, u razrješavanju zločina - svatko na svoj način.

programme.title: Castle
Castle
programme.desc:
Castle: Created by Andrew W. Marlowe. With Nathan Fillion, Stana Katic, Susan Sullivan, Jon Huertas. After a serial killer imitates the plots of his novels, successful mystery novelist Richard "Rick" Castle receives permission from the Mayor of New York City to tag along with an NYPD homicide investigation team for research purposes." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1219024/","name":"Castle","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM2NjU0ODU0NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDAwMzg5NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"After a serial killer imitates the plots of his novels, successful mystery novelist Richard "Rick" Castle receives permission from the Mayor of New York City to tag along with an NYPD homicide investigation team for research purposes","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1219024/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"marioprmpi"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"A lot of entertainment and variety","reviewBody":"Positive: 
* Funny dialogues, serious side threads, and imaginative cases through different milieus of the New York scene
* Interesting constellation between star writer Richard Castle and the normal hardworking Detective Beckett
* The intriguing interaction of the unequal team gives the series that special something


Negative: 
* The fact that the real culprit is only revealed at the end of the episode makes it exciting on the one hand, but also predictable on the other, because you always know that the first suspect is certainly not the culprit.



* Some seasons only have a few episodes that follow a real background story, which in the meantime leads to a bit of boredom due to a large number of "normal" cases lined up in a row.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Kako bi se razriješili brojni zločini, tu je ekipa za očevid CSI: Miami. Pred njima se nalaze mnogi zločini i misteriji koje treba riješiti, a predvodi ih poručnik Horatio Caine (David Caruso). Caine i Delko su u Brazilu. Odjel nakon Natalijinog prelaska u Policiju održava Duquesne. Čekaju ih istrage zločina, ali i rješavanje unutarnjih problema. Wolfe se slučajno upliće u krivotvorenje, a Duquesne je u istrazi bande ugrožen život….

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: Bivši pripadnik američkih mornaričkih specijalca vraća se iz Afganistana i koristi svoje vojne vještine kako bi postao privatni istražitelj na Havajima. Jay Hernandez glumi Thomasa Magnuma u suvremenoj adaptaciji o bivšem pripadniku američkih specijalaca koji se vraća kući iz Afganistana i koristi svoje vojne vještine kako bi postao privatni detektiv na Havajima.

programme.title: Malcolm u sredini
programme.desc: Malcolm, srednje dijete s genijalnim kvocijentom inteligencije, suočava se s borbama i izazovima svakodnevnog života, zajedno sa svojom disfunkcionalnom obitelji. Malcolm ne želi da ga doživljavaju kao štrebera, ali Lois ga posrami u školi. Reese maltretira druge, čak se potuče s kozom u zoološkom vrtu. Francis se suočava sa zlim kravama na farmi. Dewey nastupi u predstavi na koju njegova obitelj ne dođe.

programme.title: Simpsoni
programme.desc: Satiričke pustolovine obitelji iz radničke klase u gradu punom čudaka, Springfieldu. SIMPSONI nastavljaju pogađati žicu gledateljima kroz ismijavanje svega i svakoga. Kao najduže prikazivana serija u povijesti televizije, SIMPSONI su postali konstantna, inovativna i prepoznatljiva franšiza u cijelom svijetu.

programme.title: Kosti
programme.desc: Ova serija u 12 epizoda približit će priče o Brennan, Boothu i Jeffersonian-FBI ekipi, omogućujući vjernim fanovima emisije da se oproste od ovih nezaboravnih likova. Glavni likovi ove mračno zabavne proceduralne drame su usko specijalizirana forenzična antropologinja dr. Brennan i agent FBI-a Seeley Booth. Oni surađuju u istragama ubojstava u kojima su standardne metode identifikacije tijela beskorisne.

programme.title: The Aviator
The Aviator
programme.desc:
The Aviator: Directed by Martin Scorsese. With Leonardo DiCaprio, Cate Blanchett, Kate Beckinsale, John C. Reilly. A biopic depicting the early years of legendary director and aviator Howard Hughes' career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0338751/","name":"The Aviator","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTYzMjA2M2EtYmY1OC00ZWMxLThlY2YtZGI3MTQzOWM4YjE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A biopic depicting the early years of legendary director and aviator Howard Hughes' career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0338751/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"drplw"},"dateCreated":"2005-01-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Leo's Masterpiece","reviewBody":"There is no doubt that THE AVIATOR is the masterpiece of both director Martin Scorsese and actor, Leonardo DiCaprio. DiCaprio becomes Howard Hughes. The actor is so profoundly absorbed in the role that the DiCaprio we know from other films cannot be found in this film. It is a bravura performance of great depth and magnitude. DiCaprio richly deserves his first Academy Award.

I have never know much about Howard Hughes. This film opened my eyes to him as a personality, a businessman, aviator and his lavish lifestyle. DiCaprio no longer is the "pretty boy" from other films. The expressions he takes on are not handsome, the deeply furrowed brow, one could actually watch him, as Hughes' character, think his way through challenging situations, the mark of a highly gifted actor. Watching DiCaprio evolve into the paranoid schizophrenic Hughes in the latter part of the film is a stunning example of pure acting. Leo deserves recognition for recreating a most difficult personality.

Though the film is long, it never slows down nor gets boring and it commanded my attention from start to finish. It is masterpiece cinema for these two men and for other actors too. Cate Blanchette must be commended for her role as Katherine Hepburn. Every role was played by first rate actors.

If you want to understand a piece of American history from the 30s through the 1940s, this film will illumine you. It may not be the greatest film ever made but it sure is cinema to the max and worth seeing, without a second thought.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":349552,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-02-23","keywords":"obsessive compulsive disorder,test flight,film producer,howard hughes character,california","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Aviator","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3947888665","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzRjZjYwMWItMzU2NS00MmM3LTk5ZDItYmZlYmI0OGU1NDg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzRjZjYwMWItMzU2NS00MmM3LTk5ZDItYmZlYmI0OGU1NDg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Miramax"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000138/","name":"Leonardo DiCaprio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000949/","name":"Cate Blanchett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000295/","name":"Kate Beckinsale"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000217/","name":"Martin Scorsese"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035930/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0088354/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0109128/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0517589/","name":"John Logan"}],"duration":"PT2H50M"}</script><metacontent="

Watching DiCaprio evolve into the paranoid schizophrenic Hughes in the latter part of the film is a stunning example of pure acting. Leo deserves recognition for recreating a most difficult personality.

Though the film is long, it never slows down nor gets boring and it commanded my attention from start to finish. It is masterpiece cinema for these two men and for other actors too. Cate Blanchette must be commended for her role as Katherine Hepburn. Every role was played by first rate actors.

If you want to understand a piece of American history from the 30s through the 1940s, this film will illumine you. It may not be the greatest film ever made but it sure is cinema to the max and worth seeing, without a second thought.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":349552,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-02-23","keywords":"obsessive compulsive disorder,test flight,film producer,howard hughes character,california","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Aviator","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3947888665","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzRjZjYwMWItMzU2NS00MmM3LTk5ZDItYmZlYmI0OGU1NDg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzRjZjYwMWItMzU2NS00MmM3LTk5ZDItYmZlYmI0OGU1NDg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Miramax","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000138/","name":"Leonardo DiCaprio","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000949/","name":"Cate Blanchett","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000295/","name":"Kate Beckinsale"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000217/","name":"Martin Scorsese"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035930/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0088354/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0109128/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0517589/","name":"John Logan"],"duration":"PT2H50M"</script><metacontent="
