programme.title: National Lampoon's Vacation
Godišnji odmor snova
programme.desc:
National Lampoon's Vacation: Directed by Harold Ramis. With Chevy Chase, Beverly D'Angelo, Imogene Coca, Randy Quaid. The Griswold family's cross-country drive to the Walley World theme park proves to be much more arduous than they ever anticipated." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0085995/","name":"National Lampoon's Vacation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmViMGQ4ZDktNzI3OC00YjVkLWJmZDgtOTI4N2FhNjhjNDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTUyMzE4Mzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Griswold family's cross-country drive to the Walley World theme park proves to be much more arduous than they ever anticipated.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0085995/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Lechuguilla"},"dateCreated":"2011-02-06","inLanguage":"English","name":""I'm On A Pilgrimage To See A Moose"","reviewBody":""Getting there is half the fun", says bland family man Clark, head of the bland suburban family, the Griswolds. He's rationalizing why the family will drive from Illinois, instead of fly, to Wally World, a moose-centered family amusement park in California. What makes this film enjoyable is that the Griswolds are so typical of banal American suburban family values.

Clark (Chevy Chase) is a good-natured sap, gullibly idealistic, and conforming. His meek wife (well played by Beverly D'Angelo) looks up to Clark. Their two teenage kids are dull blockheads, patterned after their dull parents. The boy wears ugly dental braces.

Their mode of travel is a prehistoric, humorously ugly, putrid green station wagon with cheesy brown panels. The Griswolds blast off with unlimited optimism and good-natured anticipation of the fun they will have at Wally World. But the optimism gradually fades and is replaced by grim determination after a series of on-the-road disasters that make a mockery of idealism.

The film's humor lies in its absurd plot situations, and in the dialogue. At a cookout, a down-on-his-luck Cousin Eddie (Randy Quaid) treats the Griswolds to backyard burgers, then remarks to Clark: "I don't know why they call this stuff hamburger helper. It does just fine by itself".

Casting is appropriate. Overall acting trends humorously exaggerated, consistent with the satire. Performances by Imogene Coca and John Candy add to the comedy. The bouncy song "Holiday Road" opens the film with a series of vintage American postcards in tandem with the opening credits.

My only reservation is that some of the plot contrivances are a bit over-the-top. The writers seem to be trying a little too hard.

"Vacation" is a satire on the banality of the traditional American summer ritual, and therefore thematically rich. Production values are fine. Though not perfect, this film is worth watching.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":104510,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"1983-07-29","keywords":"road movie,dysfunctional family,national lampoon series,blonde in ferrari,lust","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2924395289","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmUxYTc1ZDMtZDM2Yi00YjdhLTg5YTctMDVlZmU2ZjRiM2QxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmUxYTc1ZDMtZDM2Yi00YjdhLTg5YTctMDVlZmU2ZjRiM2QxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000331/","name":"Chevy Chase"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000350/","name":"Beverly D'Angelo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0168042/","name":"Imogene Coca"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000601/","name":"Harold Ramis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102282/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000455/","name":"John Hughes"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0085995, Title: National Lampoon's Vacation, --- Description: National Lampoon's Vacation: Directed by Harold Ramis. With Chevy Chase, Beverly D'Angelo, Imogene Coca, Randy Quaid. The Griswold family's cross-country drive to the Walley World theme park proves to be much more arduous than they ever anticipated." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0085995/","name":"National Lampoon's Vacation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmViMGQ4ZDktNzI3OC00YjVkLWJmZDgtOTI4N2FhNjhjNDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTUyMzE4Mzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Griswold family's cross-country drive to the Walley World theme park proves to be much more arduous than they ever anticipated.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0085995/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Lechuguilla","dateCreated":"2011-02-06","inLanguage":"English","name":""I'm On A Pilgrimage To See A Moose"","reviewBody":""Getting there is half the fun", says bland family man Clark, head of the bland suburban family, the Griswolds. He's rationalizing why the family will drive from Illinois, instead of fly, to Wally World, a moose-centered family amusement park in California. What makes this film enjoyable is that the Griswolds are so typical of banal American suburban family values.

Clark (Chevy Chase) is a good-natured sap, gullibly idealistic, and conforming. His meek wife (well played by Beverly D'Angelo) looks up to Clark. Their two teenage kids are dull blockheads, patterned after their dull parents. The boy wears ugly dental braces.

Their mode of travel is a prehistoric, humorously ugly, putrid green station wagon with cheesy brown panels. The Griswolds blast off with unlimited optimism and good-natured anticipation of the fun they will have at Wally World. But the optimism gradually fades and is replaced by grim determination after a series of on-the-road disasters that make a mockery of idealism.

The film's humor lies in its absurd plot situations, and in the dialogue. At a cookout, a down-on-his-luck Cousin Eddie (Randy Quaid) treats the Griswolds to backyard burgers, then remarks to Clark: "I don't know why they call this stuff hamburger helper. It does just fine by itself".

Casting is appropriate. Overall acting trends humorously exaggerated, consistent with the satire. Performances by Imogene Coca and John Candy add to the comedy. The bouncy song "Holiday Road" opens the film with a series of vintage American postcards in tandem with the opening credits.

My only reservation is that some of the plot contrivances are a bit over-the-top. The writers seem to be trying a little too hard.

"Vacation" is a satire on the banality of the traditional American summer ritual, and therefore thematically rich. Production values are fine. Though not perfect, this film is worth watching.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":104510,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"1983-07-29","keywords":"road movie,dysfunctional family,national lampoon series,blonde in ferrari,lust","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2924395289","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmUxYTc1ZDMtZDM2Yi00YjdhLTg5YTctMDVlZmU2ZjRiM2QxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmUxYTc1ZDMtZDM2Yi00YjdhLTg5YTctMDVlZmU2ZjRiM2QxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000331/","name":"Chevy Chase","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000350/","name":"Beverly D'Angelo","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0168042/","name":"Imogene Coca"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000601/","name":"Harold Ramis"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102282/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000455/","name":"John Hughes"],"duration":"PT1H38M"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Step Up 3D: Directed by Jon M. Chu. With Rick Malambri, Adam Sevani, Sharni Vinson, Alyson Stoner. A tight-knit group of New York City street dancers find themselves pitted against the world's best hip hop dancers in a high-stakes showdown." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1193631/","name":"Step Up 3D","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcxNDU2NTE4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzQ1MTEzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A tight-knit group of New York City street dancers find themselves pitted against the world's best hip hop dancers in a high-stakes showdown.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1193631/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jmblfc93"},"dateCreated":"2010-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"How this is getting 3.9/10 i do not know :S!!","reviewBody":"i watched this film yesterday with the girlfriend, and i didn't have high hopes for the film at all, I'm not really into dance/romance movies. But during the film, with each minute i became more and more in love with it. I mean WOW!! step up 3D delivers like no other dance movie out there. This movie was amazing! the 3D was incredible, the dancing was out of this world, the songs on the film were amazing! my and my girlfriend were singing along to them, but the storyline lacked abit, apart from the storyline, Justin Chi has made the perfect dance film! I'm even debating going to see this movie again next week! although the last too step up movies lacked character, the latest instalment in the franchise definitely gives the trilogy the buzz that it needs! i rate this movie 9/10, it would of been 10/10 if the storyline wasn't lacking abit! even if you hate dance movies this movie in definitely worth watching.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":57337,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Music","Romance"],"datePublished":"2010-08-06","keywords":"3d,3 dimensional,competition,bed,false identity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Step Up 3D: Promo Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2734556697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjMyNzIyOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjM5MDQzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjMyNzIyOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjM5MDQzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A tight-knit group of New York City street dancers, including Luke (Malambri) and Natalie (Vinson), team up with NYU freshman Moose (Sevani), and find themselves pitted against the world's best hip hop dancers in a high-stakes showdown that will change their lives forever. programme.title: Crank: High Voltage
Ubrzanje 2: Visoki napon
programme.desc:
Crank: High Voltage: Directed by Mark Neveldine, Brian Taylor. With Jason Statham, Amy Smart, Dwight Yoakam, Efren Ramirez. Chelios faces a Chinese mobster who has stolen his nearly indestructible heart and replaced it with a battery-powered ticker which requires regular jolts of electricity to keep working." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1121931/","name":"Crank: High Voltage","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzNTU1ODkxNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDgyODEzMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Chelios faces a Chinese mobster who has stolen his nearly indestructible heart and replaced it with a battery-powered ticker which requires regular jolts of electricity to keep working.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1121931/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TedStixonAKAMaximumMadness"},"dateCreated":"2009-04-18","inLanguage":"English","name":""Crank: High Voltage" is one of the most over-the-top and ridiculously entertaining films of the past 10 years! It's an adult version of "Looney Toons" and a worthy sequel!","reviewBody":"Chev Chelios was dead, but he got better.

Jason Statham returns as the lead in "Crank: High Voltage", and in every way this sequel breaks the rules and pushes the bar to insane new levels, sometimes even a bit too far.

Three months after his "helicopter incident", Chelios awakens to see that Chinese black-market surgeons are slicing his famed "Chelios Heart" out (made famous by the fact that it kept beating after the events of the first film), and replacing it with a surrogate artificial heart, so they can keep him alive while they farm more of his organs.

Chelios escapes and discovers he has a whole new set of problems- his heart is connected to an external battery pack. When this battery pack runs out of juice, he only has one hour before his artificial heart stops and he dies. And of course one of the first things that happens is that his battery pack is smashed! Now Chelios has to keep his artificial heart beating with regular volts of electricity to recharge it, using anything he can- car power outlets, jumper cables, power stations, stun-guns- whatever he can get his hands on.

His goal- track down psychotic criminal Johnny Vang, who is seemingly parading around Chelios's heart in a miniature cooler, and get it back, so old friend and medical expert Doc Miles (Dwight Yoakam in a returning role as the man who lets the audience know exactly what's going on) can put it back in.

Chelios is also being tracked by sadistic criminals sent by "El Huron", a crime lord who has some devious connections to Chelios and his past actions.

This film has a very convoluted plot, but like the first one, it works out rather well. One particular thing I enjoyed is that we spend a little more time with subsequent and secondary characters, like Chev's girlfriend Eve (the sexy Amy Smart), Venus (Efron Ramirez portraying the brother to his slain character Laylo from the first film), and other characters that come up. It just adds to the plot, and gives it more reality, in contrast to the literal circus of Mayhem that Mr. Chev Chelios is stirring up.

Speaking of returning characters, this film certainly has a lot of cameos from characters from movie number one, which was a delight for me as a fan. Fans of the first "Crank", you'll definitely get a kick out of some of the cameos in this entry.

Now, onto the psychotic weirdness of the film. If you've seen the first film, you'll know it used strange tactics, like subtitles, graphics, and nightmarish imagery to put you inside of the heads of the characters. This film expands on that, by using and abusing subtitles, insane graphics, medical films, and more on a fairly regular basis. We even get a hilarious pseudo-flashback of sorts, and it is one of the most abrupt and brilliant segues I've ever seen to bridge two scenes.

And on that note, I should mention that this film does play for laughs a lot more than the first film. In fact, there are scenes specifically written to play for laughs more than for actions. As a fan, that may sound disheartening (sorry, had to make a heart pun), but trust me, it works. The film definitely teeters on self-satire at times (including a uproariously funny line of dialog where Eve swipes at fans who would call Chev surviving the first film "impossible"), but it keeps it's balance and lets us know that its not taking itself too seriously, so the comedy fits right in.

Writers/Directors Neveldine / Taylor also step the visuals up a notch. While not as haggard visually as the first film, this follow-up does have some pretty visuals, and is better-directed in terms of camera placement and editing in my opinion, and it fits right in with the first one. Their script is also to be commended for being so bold, with bizarre characters (I didn't even mention David Carradine going all "Charlie Chan"!), insane story lines, and one of the most over-the-top and unexpected finales I've seen in a long time. This isn't just an action movie, it's Looney Toons for grown-ups! It's the action equivalent of what "Evil Dead II" was to horror! It's brilliant in it's execution and definitely a step in the right direction for a sequel to "Crank"- not too serious.

This film literally left me in awe with its lunacy and action. If you loved the first film, then there's almost no way you won't love this entry.

I give "Crank: High Voltage" an 8 out of 10, because like the first film, it's the ultimate rush, and now it's even the ultimate source for laughs! Give this one a shot, you'll love it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":146615,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2009-04-17","keywords":"pixelated nudity,voyeur,voyeurism,stripper,prostitute","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Clip: Crank: High Voltage -- "Randy Fight" Clip ","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi156828441","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDIwMTk3NzY3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDU4MjY0Mg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDIwMTk3NzY3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDU4MjY0Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Here's a clip from the movie Crank: High Voltage."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005458/","name":"Jason Statham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005442/","name":"Amy Smart"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004286/","name":"Clifton Collins Jr."}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004410/","name":"Mark Neveldine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0962729/","name":"Brian Taylor"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0173285/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005323/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0029540/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004410/","name":"Mark Neveldine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0962729/","name":"Brian Taylor"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Four Rooms
Četiri sobe
programme.desc:
Four Rooms: Directed by Allison Anders, Alexandre Rockwell, Robert Rodriguez, Quentin Tarantino, Chuck Jones. With Sammi Davis, Amanda De Cadenet, Valeria Golino, Madonna. Four interlocking tales that take place in a fading hotel on New Year's Eve." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0113101/","name":"Four Rooms","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDc3Y2YwMjUtYzlkMi00MTljLTg1ZGMtYzUwODljZTI1OTZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four interlocking tales that take place in a fading hotel on New Year's Eve.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0113101/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"aimless-46"},"dateCreated":"2005-05-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Some Great Laughs","reviewBody":""Four Rooms" is far more entertaining than you would expect from its generally negative reviews. Which is not to say that any of it is a masterpiece but if you enjoyed "Love American Style" on television and are not put off by a raunchy take on that anthology concept you should make an effort to view this film. Each story is taking place in a different room of a hotel the same night. It was made between the time Tarantino made "Pulp Fiction" and worked on "Dusk Till Dawn" with Rodriquez. Many in the large cast are Tarantino and Rodriquez regulars. Here are a few of the reasons to watch each of the four stories:

"The Missing Ingredient" - Madona has simply never looked better and her "come get me" dress will burn your eyeballs. Alicia Witt plays her stock alienated teen and delivers sarcasm as only she can.

"The Wrong Man" – Alexander Rockwell directed this segment shortly after directing "In the Soup" so he already knew how to get the most out of Jennifer Beals. Her diatribe about Ted's sex organ is a cinema classic.

"The Misbehavers" – Rodriquez directs his favorite actor Antonio Banderas in something that is a throwback to classic Laurel and Hardy. Not only do his two kids misbehave when left alone in their hotel room, but their misbehavior is so comprehensive that the closing shot reveals a room of total anarchy. It is wonderful slapstick on a huge scale, with comic timing worthy of the Laural and Hardy and the Marx Brothers.

"The Man From Hollywood" – This has the best script with Tarantino reserving the best stuff for his own character. He even reprises the "tasty beverage" line from "Pulp Fiction. Beals has already found her way to this room by the time bellboy Roth arrives and she delivers more good lines. I was impressed that Tarantino built up his suspense "before" the contest began and then did not try to extend the suspense but ended things on the first attempt.

The best bit in the whole film might be Roth's phone call to his boss. Marisa Tomei answers the phone in a room full of comatose post-New Years Eve partygoers. She then does a version of her "My Cousin Vinnie" expert witness routine, this time concerning types of handguns. In the foreground the entire time are the only other conscious (but totally stoned) inhabitants of the room. They are playing against each other in a video game. One just stares in stunned fascination at the screen, holding the controller but not using it as the other player maniacally manipulates his controller throughout the entire phone conversation.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":102366,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"1995-12-25","keywords":"neo screwball comedy,anthology film,gagged woman,tied to a chair,weapon","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Four Rooms","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi821009945","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDYyNTFjNzktZDE0ZS00ZDE1LWFmOGUtZDczNmUxNDAzMzhiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDYyNTFjNzktZDE0ZS00ZDE1LWFmOGUtZDczNmUxNDAzMzhiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000619/","name":"Tim Roth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000104/","name":"Antonio Banderas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0205423/","name":"Sammi Davis"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0025978/","name":"Allison Anders"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0734319/","name":"Alexandre Rockwell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001675/","name":"Robert Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019267/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0025978/","name":"Allison Anders"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0734319/","name":"Alexandre Rockwell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001675/","name":"Robert Rodriguez"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

Which is not to say that any of it is a masterpiece but if you enjoyed "Love American Style" on television and are not put off by a raunchy take on that anthology concept you should make an effort to view this film. Each story is taking place in a different room of a hotel the same night. It was made between the time Tarantino made "Pulp Fiction" and worked on "Dusk Till Dawn" with Rodriquez. Many in the large cast are Tarantino and Rodriquez regulars. Here are a few of the reasons to watch each of the four stories:

"The Missing Ingredient" - Madona has simply never looked better and her "come get me" dress will burn your eyeballs. Alicia Witt plays her stock alienated teen and delivers sarcasm as only she can.

"The Misbehavers" – Rodriquez directs his favorite actor Antonio Banderas in something that is a throwback to classic Laurel and Hardy. Not only do his two kids misbehave when left alone in their hotel room, but their misbehavior is so comprehensive that the closing shot reveals a room of total anarchy. It is wonderful slapstick on a huge scale, with comic timing worthy of the Laural and Hardy and the Marx Brothers.

"The Man From Hollywood" – This has the best script with Tarantino reserving the best stuff for his own character. He even reprises the "tasty beverage" line from "Pulp Fiction. Beals has already found her way to this room by the time bellboy Roth arrives and she delivers more good lines. I was impressed that Tarantino built up his suspense "before" the contest began and then did not try to extend the suspense but ended things on the first attempt.

The best bit in the whole film might be Roth's phone call to his boss. Marisa Tomei answers the phone in a room full of comatose post-New Years Eve partygoers. She then does a version of her "My Cousin Vinnie" expert witness routine, this time concerning types of handguns. In the foreground the entire time are the only other conscious (but totally stoned) inhabitants of the room. They are playing against each other in a video game. programme.title: Objektivi
programme.desc: Sean Penn, Javier Bardem. 8 vite pasi arrin të eliminojë ministrin e minierave në Kongo, ish vrasësi profesionist Terrier rikthehet dhe nis një jetë të re. Por kur ish shefat e tij duan ta eliminojnë, ai bën pamundurën për të mbijetuar...

programme.title: Expo
programme.desc: Ndërsa ka vetëm tre ditë kohë për të vërtetuar pafajësinë e tij, një ish ushtar detyrohet të zbulojë rrëmbyesin e një adoleshenteje, në të kundërt do të dënohet për një krim që ai nuk e ka kryer.

programme.title: Hana
programme.desc: Saoirse Ronan, Eric Bana, Cate Blanchett. Një adoleshente e stërvitur nga babai për të qenë një vrasëse e përsosur, zbulon një sekret të së kaluarës që mund të vendosë gjithçka në dilemë, madje edhe ekzistencën e saj.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: B.Willis, B.Affleck, L.Tyler, B.B.Thornton. Kandidat për 4 çmime Oskar. Një skuadër speciale e Nasa-s niset në hapësirë për të shpëtuar Tokën nga asteroidi gjigant që për 18 ditë rrezikon t'i japë fund ekzistencës së saj.

programme.title: Njerëzit-X: Apokalipsi
programme.desc: 2016. James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender. Pasi mutanti i parë në histori, shkatërruesi Apokalips rishfaqet pas mijëra vitesh, Njerëzit-X duhet të bashkojnë forcat për t'i bërë ballë planit të tij për shfarosjen e njerëzimit.

programme.title: Djemtë e këqij
programme.desc: Martin Lawrence, Will Smith. Dy policë duhet të mbrojnë dëshmitaren e një vrasjeje, ndërkohë që kanë vetëm 72 orë kohë për të gjetur sasinë e konsiderueshme të heroinës që u vodh në stacionin e policisë mu nën hundën e tyre.

programme.title: Mbledhësit e borxheve 2
programme.desc: Scott Adkins, Louis Mandylor. Dyshja e mbledhësve të borxheve duhet të marrin paratë e vjedhura të shefit të tyre dhe të luftojnë me një bos droge hakmarrës, ndërsa përballen me rreziqe të papritura që u vijnë nga të gjitha anët.

programme.title: Xhek Riçer
programme.desc: Tom Cruise. Kur 5 njerëz të pafajshëm vriten nga një snajper, provat të çojnë tek nje i dyshuar, i arrestuar nga policia. Por gjatë pyetësorit, i dyshuari jep vetëm një përgjigje: 'Sillni Xhek Riçer'... Kush është në të vërtetë vrasësi?

programme.title: Gjahtari: Lufta e Dimrit
programme.desc: 2016. Ndërkohë që lufta midis dy motrave mbretëresha Ravena dhe Freja arrin kulmin, gjahtari Erik dhe luftëtarja Sara, të rritur për të qenë mbrojtës të Frejës, bëjnë të pamundurën të fshehin dashurinë e tyre, ndërkohë që luftojnë të keqen.

programme.title: Titanët e Paqësorit 2:Rebelimi
programme.desc: 2018. Me John Boyega. Piloti rebel Xheik Pentekost do të bashkojë forcat me hakeren 15-vjeçare dhe me ish-kolegun e tij, kundër një kërcënimi të ri alien. Ata do ta çojnë në një shkallë tjetër këte aventurë spektakolare.

programme.title: Misioni:Budapest
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich. Pasi përfshihet aksidentalisht në një traifk armësh, një adhurues i sporteve ekstreme rekrutohet nga një agjente elitare dhe misterioze në një mision të rrezikshëm, nga i cili varet fati i botës.

programme.title: Njeriu-Milingonë
programme.desc: Paul Rudd, Michael Douglas. I pajisur me një kostum që e zvogëlon sa nje115 milingonë por i jep fuqi të jashtëzakonshme, një grabitës profesionist duhet të ndihmojë mësuesin e tij për të kryer një vjedhje që do të shpëtojë botën.

programme.desc: Laura një menaxhere e suksesshme shitjesh në Varshavë, gjatë udhëtimit të saj në Siçili, rrëmbehet nga Masimo Toriçeli, një trashëgimtari i pashëm i një familjeje mafioze, i cili i kërkon 365 ditë kohë për të fituar dashurinë e saj...

programme.title: Para se të fle
programme.desc: 2014. N.Kidman, C.Firth. Pas një aksidenti të rëndë që e bën të humbasë kujtesën, një grua zgjohet çdo mëngjes pa mbajtur mend asgjë. Por papritur, të vërteta të frikshme fillojnë t'i shfaqen në vegime dhe e bëjnë të dyshojë për gjithçka...
programme.category: Mister
thriller

programme.title: Fajtorë të pafajshëm
programme.desc: 2011. Matthew McConaughey, Ryan Phillippe, Marisa Tomei. Një avokat të suksesshëm që shumicën e punës e bën nga makina e tij, e kap kriza e ndërgjegjjes kur përfaqëson një klient të pasur që ka planin ideal për të mashtruar sistemin.
programme.category: Krim
thriller

programme.title: Gracka e akullt
programme.desc: Një ditë tipike për tre miq, që do të shkonin për ski, kthehet në makth kur ata marrin teleferikun për të bërë xhiron e fundit. Punonjësit largohen, gjithçka ndalet dhe ata kuptojnë se kanë mbetur të bllokuar pa asnjë rrugëdalje...
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Krijesa e Atlantidës
programme.desc: Bazuar në romanin Albert Sánchez Piñol. Në vitin 1914, një i ri pranon të shkojë në një ishull pranë Antarktikut për të vëzhguar kushtet e motit, por shumë shpejt do të zbulojë se ishulli është i populluar nga krijesa jo miqësore me të.
programme.category: Horror
fantashkencë

programme.title: Origjina e syrit
programme.desc: 2014. Michael Pitt. Një shkencëtar që studion evolucionin e syrit, bie në dashuri me sytë e vajzës që po eksperimenton... Vite më vonë, bashkë me partneren e tij të laboratorit, ai bën një zbulim që do të ndryshojë besimin e tij si në shkencë.
programme.category: Fantashkencë
dramë

programme.title: Akullthyesi
programme.desc: Të mbijetuarit e epokës së dytë të akullnajave në Tokë, jetojnë brenda një treni luksoz që çan përmes akullit e borës. Në kërkim të kushteve më të mira, udhëtarët më të varfër, ngrihen në revoltë kundër të privilegjuarve.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Britma e urrejtjes
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins, Alec Baldwin. Ata të dy u grindën për hir të një femre kur aeroplani u rrëzua. Tani, të vetëm në pyll, të pambrojtur, mundësia e vetme për mbijetesë është të mbështeten tek njëri tjetri.
programme.category: Thriller
aventurë

programme.title: Samaritani i mirë
programme.desc: 2014.Me Dominic Cooper, Samuel L. Jackson. Pasi përfshihet në një aksident fatal, një prokuror duhet të ndjekë penalisht një njeri të pafajshëm të akuzuar për aksidentin që ai vetë shkaktoi...
programme.category: Krim
thriller

programme.title: Rrëmbimi i avionit
programme.desc: Joseph Gordon-Levitt. Pasi avioni i linjës Berlin - Paris merret peng në fluturim, piloti dytësor, që dëshmon ngjarjen nga kabina e sigurtë e pilotimit, duhet të zgjedhë mes jetëve të ekuipazhit apo shmangies së një katastrofë me të madhe.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Vrasje gjakftohtë
programme.desc: 2019. Jean Reno. Një vrasës legjender tërhiqet në qetësinë e një shtëpie të izoluar buzë liqenit. Takimi rastësor me një grua dhe sekreti që ajo fsheh, mund ta detyrojnë atë t'u rikthehet mënyrave të tij vdekjeprurëse.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Fraktura
programme.desc: Rei dhe gruaja e tij nxitojnë të çojnë vajzën e tyre në urgjencë pas një aksidenti. Gjatë vizitave, ai humbet kontaktet me familjen, por spitali nuk ka asnjë të dhënë që gruaja dhe vajza e tij të kenë qënë ndonjëherë aty...
programme.category: Thriller psikologjik

programme.title: Në terr
programme.desc: Maria Bello, Sean Bean. Një grua përjeton tmerrin më të madh të jetës se saj... e bija mbytet. E torturuar nga kujtimet e saj, ajo mëson për Tokën e të vdekurve prej nga ku vjen një legjendë shpresedhenese.
programme.category: Horror
mister

programme.title: Jeta
programme.desc: 2017. Jake Gyllenhaal, Rebecca Ferguson, Ryan Reynolds. Një grup shkencëtarësh në bordin e Stacionit Hapësinor Ndërkombëtar, zbulojnë një formë jete që zhvillohet shumë shpejt, shkaktare e shfarosjes së Marsit që tani kërcënon Tokën.
programme.category: Fantashkencë
horror

programme.title: Nata e djallit - Kapitulli 3
programme.desc: Në kapitullin e 3 të 'Nata e djallit', tregohet se si përpara tmerrit që përjetoi familja Lambert, mediumja Elis Rain përdori aftësitë për te kontaktuar me të vdekurit, për të mbrojtur një adoleshente të rrezikuar nga një forcë djallëzore.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Engjëj dhe djaj
programme.desc: Tom Hanks, Ewan McGregor, Ayelet Zurer. Një ekspert i simbologjisë në universitetin e Harvardit, përpiqet të zbulojë një vrasje në Vatikandhe të parandalojë komplotin e një vëllazërie të fshehtë.
programme.category: Thriller
mister

programme.title: Saga Twilight: Agim i ri - 1
programme.desc: K.Stewart, R.Pattinson. Kapitulli i 5 dhe i fundit i sagës 'Twilight', do të jetë i paharrueshëm! Pas lindjes së vajzës, Eduart dhe Bella po shijojnë jetën e tyre dhe fuqitë e saj të reja. Por një rrezik i ri, kërcënon t'i shkatërrojë të gjithë...
programme.category: Fantazi

programme.title: Rrethi 3
programme.desc: Një vajzë e re shqetësohet për të dashurin pasi ai shikon një video që flitet se vret këdo pas 7 ditësh. Per ta ndihmuar, vendos ta shohe vetë filmimin dhe zbulon se brenda tij ndodhet një mesazh që askush nuk e ka vënë re më parë...
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Drakula: Historia e patreguar
programme.desc: 2014. Luke Evans. Historia e patreguar e origjinës së Drakulës. I këcënuar nga pushtimi Otoman, që kërkon t'i marrë edhe fëmijët e tij si ushtarë, Drakula kërkon ndihmën e një njeriu misterioz, që mund t'i japë fuqitë për të mundur çdo armik.
programme.category: Fantazi
aksion

programme.title: Në ujërat e cekëta
programme.desc: 2016.Blake Lively, Brett Cullen. Kur Nensi, një vajzë e re vendos të bëjë sërf në një plazh të izoluar, ajo sulmohet nga një peshkaqen gjigant dhe bllokohet në një shkëmb thuajse 200 metra nga bregu. Tani ajo duhet të bëjë të pamundurën për të mbijetuar..
programme.category: Horror
thriller

programme.title: Dëbora e Luftës së Ftohtë
programme.desc: Gjatë Luftës së Ftohtë, një ruse që spiunon për llogari të amerikanëve, ngarkohet të vjedhë informacione nga një politikan i ri, i parapëlqyeri i Kremlinit, por detyra ndërlikohet kur ajo bie në dashuri me të.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Vajza në tren
programme.desc: 2016. Emily Blunt. Bazuar në thrillerin bestseller të Paula Hawkins! Gjatë rrugëtimit të përditshëm me tren, një vajzë e divorcuar bëhet dëshmitare e një ngjarjeje tronditëse dhe përfshihet në misterin që rrezikon t'i shkatërrojë jetën.
programme.category: Mister
thriller

programme.title: 7 ditë në Entebe
programme.desc: 2018. Rosamund Pike, Daniel Brühl. Korrik 1976. Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë të pengmarrjes së avionit të 'Air Francë', i cili bëri ulje të detyruar në Entebe, Ugandë, dhe e sulmit më të guximshëm të kryer ndonjëherë për shpëtimin e pengjeve.
programme.category: Krim

programme.title: Grabitësit magjikë 2
programme.desc: 2016. Jesse Eisenberg, Woody Harrelson, Daniel Radcliffe. Katër Kalorësit, rishfaqen për të demaskuar një gjeni të teknologjisë, por detyrohen nga ai për të kryer vjedhjen më spektakolare të karrierës së tyre.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Orët heroike
programme.desc: Chris Pine, Casey Affleck.Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë të shpëtimit më të guximshëm të rojeve bregdetare amerikane. Pasi një stuhi ndan më dysh një naftëmbajtëse, 4 roje bregdetare bëjnë të pamundurën për të shpëtuar marinarët e bllokuar.
programme.category: Biografi
Aventurë

programme.title: Fajtori
programme.desc: Detektivi i policisë Joe Baylor (Jake Gyllenhaal), i caktuar përkohësisht në detyrën e operatorit në qëndrën e ndihmës së shpejtë, përpiqet të shpëtojë jetën e Emily (Riley Keough), një telefonuese e alarmuar që thotë se është rrëmbyer. Por, asgjë nuk është ashtu siç duket.

programme.title: Venom 2: Furia e Masakrës
programme.desc: Me Tom Hardy, Woody Harrelson, Michelle Williams. Bashkëjetesa midis Eddie Brock dhe alienit Venom, vazhdon të jetë e konfliktuale. Por kur vrasësi i rrezikshëm serial Cletus Kasady, arratiset nga burgu, Brock dhe Venom duhet të lënë mënjanë mosmarrëveshjet e tyre, për të ndaluar mbretërimin e terrorit të tij...

programme.title: Lepurushi Piter 2: Arratisja
programme.desc: Thomas dhe Bea tani janë të martuar dhe jetojnë me Piterin dhe familjen e tij të lepurushave. I mërzitur nga jeta në kopsht, Piteri shkon në qytetin e madh, ku takon personazhe misteriozë dhe përfundon duke i hapur telashe të gjithë familjes.

programme.title: Agjenti 007: S'ka kohë për të vdekur

programme.title: Logan
Logan
programme.desc:
Logan: Directed by James Mangold. With Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Dafne Keen, Boyd Holbrook. In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3315342/","name":"Logan","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzc5MTU4N2EtYTkyMi00NjdhLTg3NWEtMTY4OTEyMzJhZTAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc1NTYyMjg@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3315342/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"trublu215"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"If there was ever a comic book movie deemed worthy of perfect, Logan is it.","reviewBody":"The word 'perfect' is very objective especially when it comes to film. While Logan may not be a perfect film, it is most certainly a perfect comic book film. It is a masterpiece of the most epic proportions and leaves us with a brilliant swan song for producer and star Hugh Jackman in his final outing as Wolverine. The film, directed brilliantly by James Mangold, is a two plus hour comic book fan's wet dream as we see the version of Wolverine every fan has wanted to see for nearly two decades. While many will be very sad to see Jackman step down from the role, he couldn't have picked a better or more satisfying film to end his cinematic legacy with.

The film takes place in 2029 and shows the world in shambles. Mutants are nearly extinct, water is scarce and the world is just an overall wasteland. This is where we find Logan. He is a limo driving cantankerous caretaker to an even more cantankerous Professor X, who is now suffering from dementia and seizures. He is a borderline alcoholic suffering from a mysterious illness that limits his mutant abilities. Due to this, he lives this quiet life until he meets a young girl who he feels he must protect. Without giving too much away, there is much more here than I can go into but I will say, if you are a fan of the Wolverine comics, this film will bring a tear to your eye. This is probably the most faithful adaptation of a comic book character EVER, Marvel and DC combined. The way the story goes, the way Logan behaves, the selflessness and the rage, this is an all around realized version of this character. While it may have taken a little longer than it should have, this film was worth the wait. James Mangold does a fantastic job at creating the world Logan knows now. This is more of a film like Mangold's 3:10 to Yuma. It is bleak, violent and absolutely heartbreaking. This is far from the PG-13 character we're used to. This is a foul mouthed, miserable and very VERY bloody rendition of the source material. This is a film very much like The Guantlet or Badlands, a crime thriller and on-the-road drama. It very much embodies the look and feel of a film from the mid-70s and it plays to this very well. 

The performances in this film are amazing. Hugh Jackman's performance here is the best as the character and may be one of the best of his career. He is miserable and broken in this film and to see him like this as the character, it is bittersweet especially because Jackman has been so attached to this role. If he hurts, we hurt. If he's mad, we're mad. It is a true testament to Jackman as an actor to make his audience feel this connected to someone who is, by traditional standards, completely unrelateable. Boyd Holbrook brings a sinister performance to this and continues to build a very impressive resume. Holbrook is someone who you'll love to hate. The real standout performance here is from Dafne Keen who plays Laura. Without giving away any spoilers, she is BADASS in this film and even gives Logan a run for his money on the brutality.

Overall, Logan is a perfect comic book adaptation that is as heartbreaking as it is visually stunning. Mangold and Jackman create a special film with this that should be talked about for years to come. Believe the hype, Logan is a seriously amazing comic book film that just may be the best ever made and embodies the definition of a perfect adaptation.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":702453,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2017-03-03","keywords":"marvel comics,x men,superhero,mutant,north dakota","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Super Bowl Spot","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1946727961","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU3NmY1NTktOTY5NC00NzY0LTk1YzUtYzBmYWFhNDhiMDM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU3NmY1NTktOTY5NC00NzY0LTk1YzUtYzBmYWFhNDhiMDM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the Super Bowl Spot for 'Logan.'"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0413168/","name":"Hugh Jackman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001772/","name":"Patrick Stewart"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6748436/","name":"Dafne Keen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003506/","name":"James Mangold"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047120/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0420822/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003506/","name":"James Mangold"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0291082/","name":"Scott Frank"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0338169/","name":"Michael Green"}],"duration":"PT2H17M"}</script><metacontent="

In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3315342/","name":"Logan","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzc5MTU4N2EtYTkyMi00NjdhLTg3NWEtMTY4OTEyMzJhZTAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc1NTYyMjg@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3315342/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"trublu215","dateCreated":"2017-02-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"If there was ever a comic book movie deemed worthy of perfect, Logan is it.","reviewBody":"The word 'perfect' is very objective especially when it comes to film. While Logan may not be a perfect film, it is most certainly a perfect comic book film. It is a masterpiece of the most epic proportions and leaves us with a brilliant swan song for producer and star Hugh Jackman in his final outing as Wolverine. The film, directed brilliantly by James Mangold, is a two plus hour comic book fan's wet dream as we see the version of Wolverine every fan has wanted to see for nearly two decades. While many will be very sad to see Jackman step down from the role, he couldn't have picked a better or more satisfying film to end his cinematic legacy with.

The film takes place in 2029 and shows the world in shambles. Mutants are nearly extinct, water is scarce and the world is just an overall wasteland. This is where we find Logan. He is a limo driving cantankerous caretaker to an even more cantankerous Professor X, who is now suffering from dementia and seizures. He is a borderline alcoholic suffering from a mysterious illness that limits his mutant abilities. Due to this, he lives this quiet life until he meets a young girl who he feels he must protect. Without giving too much away, there is much more here than I can go into but I will say, if you are a fan of the Wolverine comics, this film will bring a tear to your eye. This is probably the most faithful adaptation of a comic book character EVER, Marvel and DC combined. The way the story goes, the way Logan behaves, the selflessness and the rage, this is an all around realized version of this character. While it may have taken a little longer than it should have, this film was worth the wait. James Mangold does a fantastic job at creating the world Logan knows now. This is more of a film like Mangold's 3:10 to Yuma. It is bleak, violent and absolutely heartbreaking. This is far from the PG-13 character we're used to. This is a foul mouthed, miserable and very VERY bloody rendition of the source material. This is a film very much like The Guantlet or Badlands, a crime thriller and on-the-road drama. It very much embodies the look and feel of a film from the mid-70s and it plays to this very well. 

The performances in this film are amazing. Hugh Jackman's performance here is the best as the character and may be one of the best of his career. He is miserable and broken in this film and to see him like this as the character, it is bittersweet especially because Jackman has been so attached to this role. If he hurts, we hurt. If he's mad, we're mad. It is a true testament to Jackman as an actor to make his audience feel this connected to someone who is, by traditional standards, completely unrelateable. Boyd Holbrook brings a sinister performance to this and continues to build a very impressive resume. Holbrook is someone who you'll love to hate. The real standout performance here is from Dafne Keen who plays Laura. Without giving away any spoilers, she is BADASS in this film and even gives Logan a run for his money on the brutality.

Overall, Logan is a perfect comic book adaptation that is as heartbreaking as it is visually stunning. Mangold and Jackman create a special film with this that should be talked about for years to come. Believe the hype, Logan is a seriously amazing comic book film that just may be the best ever made and embodies the definition of a perfect adaptation.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":702453,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2017-03-03","keywords":"marvel comics,x men,superhero,mutant,north dakota","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Super Bowl Spot","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1946727961","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU3NmY1NTktOTY5NC00NzY0LTk1YzUtYzBmYWFhNDhiMDM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU3NmY1NTktOTY5NC00NzY0LTk1YzUtYzBmYWFhNDhiMDM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the Super Bowl Spot for 'Logan.'","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0413168/","name":"Hugh Jackman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001772/","name":"Patrick Stewart","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6748436/","name":"Dafne Keen"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003506/","name":"James Mangold"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047120/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0420822/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003506/","name":"James Mangold","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0291082/","name":"Scott Frank","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0338169/","name":"Michael Green"],"duration":"PT2H17M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Green Lantern
Zelena svetiljka
programme.desc:
Green Lantern: Directed by Martin Campbell. With Ryan Reynolds, Blake Lively, Peter Sarsgaard, Mark Strong. Reckless test pilot Hal Jordan is granted an alien ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers that inducts him into an intergalactic police force, the Green Lantern Corps." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1133985/","name":"Green Lantern","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQ1YTIxNzEtMzcxNC00NTUzLThkZjktMmJlYTcyMjBhMGUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Reckless test pilot Hal Jordan is granted an alien ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers that inducts him into an intergalactic police force, the Green Lantern Corps.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1133985/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Fields201"},"dateCreated":"2011-06-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's Not Easy Being Green.....","reviewBody":"I went to see Green Lantern because a friend of mine was boycotting DC for such a long time because there has been no release of a Green Lantern movie. Sure, there were plenty reincarnations of Batman and Superman, but where's Green Lantern? Someone out there listened to his plea, and the result is this.....

A mess.

I will go on record to say that it's at least enjoyable. Even though the movie seems to be everywhere in its storytelling, with characters being underdeveloped and random things just happening. I would say that during this movie, I had a hard time finding a bathroom break. I was at least interested to see where the movie is going.

Let me try to explain this movie: There is this elite group of Green Lanterns led by Sinestro (well played by Mark Strong) who are having a hard time beating this giant alien in the Milky Way called The Parallax. So when their alien friend who's name I cannot remember falls to earth and dies, his ring is sent out to choose a new victim, and somehow it chooses Ryan Reynolds. Mr. Reynolds discovers that he has a new ability, and that he is the earth's only hope, but he can't handle that until the end of the movie. Not only that, but some doctor guy turns into an evil alien which, I guess, is controlled by Parallax, and Ryan has to stop him too.

I must say that I was intrigued by the doctor subplot where he is not accepted by his father (Tim Robbins) and slowly goes insane until he turns into John Travolta from Battlefield: Earth. I also liked seeing Ryan Reynolds in the movie because he brings energy to what could otherwise be a boring movie, and I was enjoying both stories that were coming along. The problem is that the whole movie felt disjointed, and not only did scenes felt random, but events turn random too.

Like the scene where Reynolds is chosen by the ring. It just happens out of nowhere. One minute he's talking to this kid (which never served much purpose to the film) and then all of a sudden he's walking and gets carried away in green light to that dying alien dude. This happened in more than one occasion. Also the CGI was all over the place, even on Reynold's outfit, and it's rather distracting. It's very vibrant and colorful (which is good), but it looked very cartoonish and took me out of the film. I also mentioned that the characters are underdeveloped, which goes a lot to Sinestro and that Parallax thing they are trying to fight. Heck, even the love interest felt underdeveloped. By the end of the film, I felt like I barely knew the characters, with just a likable performance by Ryan Reynolds.

However, Green Lantern isn't boring, just purely average. I think the reason why I sort of liked this film was that I went into it not expecting much. I already had groups of people telling me that this film is awful before its release, so I ended up getting a little more than I expected. Just a little. It was still entertaining, to say the least.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":277967,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2011-06-17","keywords":"comicbook movie,ring,spacecraft,alien,magical ring","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Green Lantern - 3D Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3445005593","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDA3NDkxNjQ3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzAzOTgzNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDA3NDkxNjQ3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzAzOTgzNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A test pilot is granted a mystical green ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers, as well as membership into an intergalactic squadron tasked with keeping peace within the universe. more Â»"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005351/","name":"Ryan Reynolds"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0515116/","name":"Blake Lively"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0765597/","name":"Peter Sarsgaard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0132709/","name":"Martin Campbell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033149/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0283444/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0075528/","name":"Greg Berlanti"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0338169/","name":"Michael Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0973233/","name":"Marc Guggenheim"}],"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Paper Towns
Gradovi na papiru
programme.desc: Paper Towns: Directed by Jake Schreier. With Nat Wolff, Cara Delevingne, Austin Abrams, Justice Smith. After an all-night adventure, Quentin's lifelong crush, Margo, disappears, leaving behind clues that Quentin and his friends follow on the journey of a lifetime." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3622592/","name":"Paper Towns","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE2ODQxODMwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDY5NjY3NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"After an all-night adventure, Quentin's lifelong crush, Margo, disappears, leaving behind clues that Quentin and his friends follow on the journey of a lifetime.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3622592/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2016-05-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Hints of Margo","reviewBody":"Another teen movie, another movie of coming of age and finding love or at least your destiny (not a lot to ask for then). But while that may sound sarcastic, the movie itself is really good. Nicely written, especially the dialog and the characters, this can be real fun to watch for a lot of people.\n\nNow, what I haven't mentioned yet, is the fact, that I haven't read the novel. So I can't say anything about how you'll react to it, if you have or how accurate it is in adapting the material. Nevertheless, the acting is spot on and the message is delivered, even if it's being soft on the edges at times, but it's a movie, it's allowed to do that. Silly, fun and maybe with some bad advice depending on how you read some things that happen ...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":100154,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-07-24","keywords":"based on novel,travel,teenage girl,unrequited love,friendship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2452795417","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyNjAxNDc3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDMxNDg4NTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyNjAxNDc3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDMxNDg4NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A coming-of-age story centering on Quentin and his enigmatic neighbor Margo, who loved mysteries so much she became one. After taking him on an all-night adventure through their hometown, Margo suddenly disappears - leaving behind cryptic clues for Quentin to decipher. The search leads Quentin and his quick-witted friends on an exhilarating adventure that is equal parts hilarious and moving. Ultimately, to track down Margo, Quentin must find a deeper understanding of true friendship - and true love."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1822659/","name":"Nat Wolff"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5353321/","name":"Cara Delevingne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3641002/","name":"Austin Abrams"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1500577/","name":"Jake Schreier"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0069651/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2354099/","name":"Scott Neustadter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2352210/","name":"Michael H. programme.title: Antoinette dans les Cévennes
Moj magarac, moj ljubavnik i ja
programme.desc: Antoinette dans les Cévennes: Directed by Caroline Vignal. With Laure Calamy, Benjamin Lavernhe, Olivia Côte, Marc Fraize. Antoinette, a school teacher, is looking forward to her long planned summer holidays with her secret lover Vladimir, the father of one of her pupils. When learning that Vladimir cannot come because his wife organized a surprise trekking holiday in the Cévennes National Park with their daughter and a donkey to carry their load, Antoinette decides to follow their track, by herself, with Patrick, a protective donkey." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11013434/","name":"Antoinette dans les Cévennes","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGQ4YjU4NWMtZGNhYS00MjFiLTgxMTUtNDRlY2ZjYWI3MGQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzA4MDA0Mjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Antoinette, a school teacher, is looking forward to her long planned summer holidays with her secret lover Vladimir, the father of one of her pupils. Antoinette, a school teacher, is looking forward to her long planned summer holidays with her secret lover Vladimir, the father of one of her pupils. When learning that Vladimir cannot come because his wife organized a surprise trekking holiday in the Cévennes National Park with their daughter and a donkey to carry their load, Antoinette decides to follow their track, by herself, with Patrick, a protective donkey." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11013434/","name":"Antoinette dans les Cévennes","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGQ4YjU4NWMtZGNhYS00MjFiLTgxMTUtNDRlY2ZjYWI3MGQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzA4MDA0Mjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Antoinette, a school teacher, is looking forward to her long planned summer holidays with her secret lover Vladimir, the father of one of her pupils. programme.title: Hancock
Henkok
programme.desc: Hancock: Directed by Peter Berg. With Will Smith, Charlize Theron, Jason Bateman, Jae Head. Hancock is a superhero whose ill-considered behavior regularly causes damage in the millions. He changes when the person he saves helps him improve his public image." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0448157/","name":"Hancock","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgyMzc4ODU3NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjk5Mzc1MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Hancock is a superhero whose ill-considered behavior regularly causes damage in the millions. He changes when the person he saves helps him improve his public image.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0448157/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kathleen-pangan"},"dateCreated":"2008-07-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"About a superhuman who is just very human","reviewBody":"Hancock was a pretty interesting as well as entertaining movie. It definitely wasn't your typical superhero movie; and it wasn't originally a DC or Marvel comic. It's more about what would happen if someone with superheroes was around in modern times, and that is what makes it interesting. If there's some property damage done while catching criminals, people will be angry; if a vigilante has a bad attitude, people will be angry. I suppose Batman explores some of that not being liked by the public, as well as the bad attitude and personal trauma of the hero, but I found Hancock to be quite original in its handling of these issues. I liked the media attention and the use of sunglasses as a "mask" of sorts. I really liked how Hancock progresses as a character, and I liked the other characters as well. Usually little kids in movies annoy me, but the son of the supporting character was pretty cute and endearing. This isn't really a hero movie where there is a superhero and a super villain; I think it's more about what it means to be a human and relate to other people, to do good things and the desire to be accepted. I think the best part of Hancock is that it's about a superhuman who is just very human. It was a lot of fun.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":464352,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2008-07-02","keywords":"superhero,black superhero,non comic book superhero,tough girl,destruction","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Hancock: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2497904921","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3MjY1MjU1MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk2NzMzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3MjY1MjU1MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk2NzMzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the second theatrical trailer for Hancock, directed by Peter Berg."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000226/","name":"Will Smith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000234/","name":"Charlize Theron"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000867/","name":"Jason Bateman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000916/","name":"Peter Berg"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0237209/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1378206/","name":"Vy Vincent Ngo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0319213/","name":"Vince Gilligan"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
Hotel Transilvanija
programme.desc:
Hotel Transylvania: Directed by Genndy Tartakovsky. With Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg, Selena Gomez, Kevin James. Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teenaged daughter." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0837562/","name":"Hotel Transylvania","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3NjQyODI3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDM4NjM0OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teenaged daughter.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0837562/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jancr57"},"dateCreated":"2012-09-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Let the child in you enjoy this adventure","reviewBody":"Cute movie. Has a couple of great messages -- especially one about prejudices. There are some adult jokes, some childish jokes, lots of laugh out loud moments but most importantly the following messages: Hatred against those we don't know is wrong; Let yourself get to know a person before deciding whether they are good or not; and go along for the ride and let yourself enjoy life.

I also love the fact that this is a Dad raising his child situation. There are really few movies that show a Dad can step up and do the right thing for their children if given the chance.

While I didn't particularly care for the fart joke or some of the childish parts the kids in the theater laughed and laughed.

Well done!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":240962,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2012-10-31","keywords":"monster,hotel,plane,party,dragon","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2571739673","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxMzY0NDM1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjgxMTk5Nw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxMzY0NDM1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjgxMTk5Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teen-aged daughter. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001191/","name":"Adam Sandler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0416673/","name":"Kevin James"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1676221/","name":"Andy Samberg"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0850733/","name":"Genndy Tartakovsky"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0121181/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0059609/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0063165/","name":"Peter Baynham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0806912/","name":"Robert Smigel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0244110/","name":"Todd Durham"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

Mortal Kombat
programme.desc: الصراع المميت: Directed by Simon McQuoid. With Lewis Tan, Jessica McNamee, Josh Lawson, Joe Taslim. MMA fighter Cole Young seeks out Earth's greatest champions in order to stand against the enemies of Outworld in a high stakes battle for the universe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0293429/","name":"Mortal Kombat","alternateName":"الصراع المميت","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2ZlNWIxODMtN2YwZi00ZjNmLWIyN2UtZTFkYmZkNDQyNTAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODkzNTgxMDg@._V1_.jpg","description":"MMA fighter Cole Young seeks out Earth's greatest champions in order to stand against the enemies of Outworld in a high stakes battle for the universe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0293429/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"viantyara"},"dateCreated":"2021-04-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fun, gory but could be better!","reviewBody":"I don't really play Mortal Kombat or even follow the concept behind it. But even so, I enjoyed this movie. The fighting choreography is top notch! The costume, the cgi is also worth the hype. I love that they decided to make it rated R. But there's also some things that bothered me, like some bad cinematography, cheesy dialogues, and the somehow boring protagonist. The act 3 of the movie really felt rushed like the writers only had 5 minutes left to finish the script. I hope the sequel will have a better act 3.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":155279,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2021-04-23","keywords":"based on video game,gore,graphic violence,reboot,two word title","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4226400281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjNjMTdkNjUtNzRmNi00ZTZjLTgzMDUtNzBhNTVmODUwM2QxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjNjMTdkNjUtNzRmNi00ZTZjLTgzMDUtNzBhNTVmODUwM2QxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"MMA fighter Cole Young seeks out Earth's greatest champions in order to stand against the enemies of Outworld in a high stakes battle for the universe."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1167985/","name":"Lewis Tan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2537621/","name":"Jessica McNamee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0493257/","name":"Josh Lawson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2585406/","name":"Simon McQuoid"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0504531/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0163543/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859643/","name":"Greg Russo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1709264/","name":"Dave Callaham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3349927/","name":"Oren Uziel"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

I hope the sequel will have a better act 3.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":155279,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2021-04-23","keywords":"based on video game,gore,graphic violence,reboot,two word title","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4226400281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjNjMTdkNjUtNzRmNi00ZTZjLTgzMDUtNzBhNTVmODUwM2QxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjNjMTdkNjUtNzRmNi00ZTZjLTgzMDUtNzBhNTVmODUwM2QxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"MMA fighter Cole Young seeks out Earth's greatest champions in order to stand against the enemies of Outworld in a high stakes battle for the universe.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1167985/","name":"Lewis Tan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2537621/","name":"Jessica McNamee","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0493257/","name":"Josh Lawson"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2585406/","name":"Simon McQuoid"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0504531/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0163543/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859643/","name":"Greg Russo","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1709264/","name":"Dave Callaham","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3349927/","name":"Oren Uziel"],"duration":"PT1H50M"</script><metacontent="

Directed by Josh Boone (The Fault in our Stars) and written by Josh Boone & Knate Lee, The New Mutants stars: Maisie Williams (Game of Thrones); Anya Taylor-Joy (Glass); Charlie Heaton (Stranger Things); Alice Braga (Predators); Blu Hunt (The Originals); and Henry Zaga (13 Reasons Why). The film is produced by Simon Kinberg, p.g.a., Karen Rosenfelt and Lauren Shuler Donner with Stan Lee and Michele Imperato Stabile serving as executive producers."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3586035/","name":"Maisie Williams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5896355/","name":"Anya Taylor-Joy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6390427/","name":"Charlie Heaton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1837748/","name":"Josh Boone"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0781821/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047120/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0566686/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1837748/","name":"Josh Boone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1029878/","name":"Knate Lee"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="
